yeṣāṃ madhye kathayati na ced īdṛśaḥ ko’py upāya
nūnaṃ bibheda yad asau prasasāda sadyaḥ
pratyaṅgaṃ prati karma narmaparayā kṛtvādhirūḍhaṃ smarād
autsukyaṃ pravilokya mohanavidhau cāturyam ālokya ca |
sadyo yāvakamaṇḍanaṃ na racitaṃ pāde kuraṅgīdṛśā
smerāntā viśadacchade ca śayane dṛṣṭiḥ samāropitā
tadbhāvāvagatau tayāpi rataye svaṃ cittam āviṣkṛtam |
nātte yan maṇikuṇḍale parihṛto hāraḥ samaṃ kaṅkaṇaiḥ
kāñcīdāma nirākṛtaṃ vicakilaiḥ kÿptaś ca no śekharaḥ
mugdhākṣī svaiptīti tatparijanaṃ svairaṃ priye pṛcchati |
mātaḥ svaptum apīha vārayati mām ityāhitakrodhayā
nijaḥ puro vā guṇināṃ na vidyate |
muñcaināṃ jaḍa kiṃ na paśyasi galadbāṣpāmbudhautānanāṃ
sakhyaivaṃ gadite vimucya rabhasāt kaṇṭhe vilagno mayā
rasavad amṛtaṃ kaḥ sandeho madhūny api nānyathā
sakṛd api punar madhyasthaḥ san rasāntaravijjano
vadatu yad ihānyat svādu syāt priyāradanacchadāt
phalam alaghu kiṃ līlāvallyā gṛhaṃ nu guṇaśriyām
nidhir uta rateḥ sarvasvaṃ vā vilāsavidheḥ priyair
śūnyaṃ vāsagṛhaṃ vilokya śayanād utthāya kiṃcic chanair
nidrāvyājam upāgatasya suciraṃ nirvarṇya patyur mukham |
lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa hasatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā
prāptaṃ tair amṛtaṃ mudhaiva mathito mūḍhaiḥ suraiḥ sāgaraḥ
paravyasanakātarāḥ kim u na kurvate sādhavaḥ
kānte tathā katham api prathitaṃ mṛgākṣyā
ākṛṣṭe jaghanāṃśuke kṛtam adhaḥ saṃsaktam ūrudvayam |
samākṛṣṭaṃ vāsaḥ katham api haṭhāt paśyati tadā
tayā dṛṣṭiṃ dattvā mahati maṇidīpe nipuṇayā
dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭim adho dadāti kurute nālāpam ābhāṣitā
śayyāyāṃ parivṛtya tiṣṭhati balād āliṅgitā vepate |
jātā vāmatayaiva samprati mama prītyai navoḍhā priyā

amaroḥ | (amaru 38, Sv 2056, sa.ka.ā.m 512; śā.pa. 3673; Vishnudas to
                            u.nī. 5.19)
svau hastau nayati stanāvaraṇatām āliṅgyamānā balāt |
sakhīnāṃ śikṣābhiḥ katham api gatā vāsabhavanaṃ
bāhū sīdata eva kampavidhurau śaktau na kaṇṭhagrahe |

kasyacit | (Sv 2065 śrīḍāmarasya; sū.mu. 54.10 kasyāpi; padyā. 380
                            śubhrasya)
samāliṅgaty aṅgair apasarati yat preyasi vapuḥ
pidhātuṃ yad dṛśyaṃ ghaṭayati ghanāliṅganam api |
taopbhir bhūyobhiḥ kim u na kamanīyaṃ sukṛtinām
pratyūhaḥ na tayor babhūva suratārambhaḥ priyambhāvukaḥ
ūrvor mūlam upeyivān atha śanair mām eti lajjājaḍaṃ
jalpantyā suratātithiḥ kila ruṣā pāṇis talenāhṛtaḥ
muñceti skhalitākṣareṇa vacasā tanvī yathā yācate
rāgāc cumbitam apy upetya vadanaṃ pītaṃ ca vaktrāmṛtam |
niḥśeṣeṇa samāpito ratividhir vācā tu nāṅgīkṛtaḥ
aṅgāni ślathaniḥ sahāni nayate mugdhālase vibhrama
sākṣepaṃ ca sacāṭukaṃ pralapatoḥ premālasaṃ paśyator
utsūtraṃ ca sasūtram eva ca parīrambhotsavaṃ kurvatoḥ |
sotkaṇṭhaṃ paripaśyator api muhuḥ sotprāsam ājalpatoḥ
sānandaṃ ca sakautukaṃ ca madanavyāpāram abhyasyatoḥ |
tat tvāṃ pātu cirāya kiṃ hariharabrahmādibhir daivataiḥ
paraṃ tūṣṇīm ete dadhati raśanādāmni maṇayaḥ
prāyaṃ kāntajayāya kiṃcid upari prārambhi yat sambhramāt |
vakṣo mīlitam akṣi pauruṣarasaḥ strīṇāṃ kaḥ sidhyati
saṃbhedeṣu mitho dṛśāṃ sukṛtinaḥ kasyāpi kāntānanaṃ
yad ārabdhaṃ kiṃcit tadupaśamahetoḥ sakhi mayā
sragdāma svayam anyad eva tadupakrāntaṃ mayā sāhasam |
saṃpannāḥ sakhi tasya kelividhayaḥ prācyāḥ paraṃ durvaha
śayyāṃ saṃprati komalāṅgi paruṣety āropya māṃ vakṣasi |
nākṛṣyāmbaram ātmano yad ucitaṃ dhūrtena tatprastutam
prāgalbhyāt tad anuṣṭhitaṃ mṛgadṛśā śakyaṃ na yad yoṣitām |
nirvyūḍhaṃ na yadā tayā tad akhilaṃ khinnais tatas tārakaiḥ
savrīḍaiś ca vilokitair mayi punar nyastaḥ samasto bharaḥ
dṛṣṭā dhārṣṭyād avanatamukhī sā mayā mohanānte
sthagayati karaṃ patyur netre vihasya samākulā
surataviratau ramyaṃ tanvī punaḥ punar īkṣyate
namantyās tadrūpaṃ yadi likhitum īśo manasijaḥ
masṛṇamasṛṇaṃ preyaḥ prātar nivārya vapuḥ svakaṃ
tad anu ca tirodhāya svairaṃ ratotsavamaṇḍanam |
snapayati dṛśā puṇyātmānaṃ kam apy uṣasi priyā
kāñcīdāma daraślathāñcalam iti prātar nikhātair dṛśor
ebhiḥ kāmaśarais tadadbhutam abhūd yan me manaḥ kīlitam
samālambya vyastāṃ calam alasam utthāya śayanāt |
ekaṃ bhūmitale nidhāya caraṇaṃ talpe prakalpyāparaṃ
saṃketonmukhayoś cirāt katham api prāpte kramād darśane
yat saukhyaṃ navaraktayos taruṇayos tat kena sāmyaṃ vrajet
sa svargād aparo vidhiḥ sa ca sudhāsekaḥ kṣaṇān netrayos
tatsāmrājyam akhaṇḍitaṃ tad aparaṃ premṇaḥ pratiṣṭhāspadam |
cādyaśvo bhavitā samāgama iti prītyā pramodaś ca yaḥ |
prāpte caiva samāgame sarabhasaṃ yac cumbanāliṅganāny
etatkāmaphalaṃ tad eva surataṃ śeṣaḥ paśūnām iva
tan mohanaṃ na khalu maithunam anyad asmāt
kānte talpam upāgate vigalitā nīvī svayaṃ bandhanād
vāsaś ca ślathamekhalāguṇadhṛtaṃ kiṃcin nitambe sthitam |
etāvat sakhi vedmi kevalam aho tasyāṅgasaṅge punaḥ
ko’sau kāsmi rataṃ ca kiṃ kīdṛśam iti svalpāpi me na smṛtiḥ

vikaṭanitambāyāḥ | (sa.ka.ā. 5.44, da.rū.. under 2.18, Sv 2147, śā.pa.
                            3747, sū.mu. 86.17, su.ra. 572)
narmasmitaṃ ca vadanaṃ ca rasaṃ ca tasya |
nīvīṃ prati praṇihite tu kare priyeṇa
sakhyaḥ śapāmi yadi kiṃcid api smarāmi
ātte vāsasi roddhum akṣamatayā doḥkandalībhyāṃ stanau
śroṇīṃ tasya kare’dhirohati punar vrīḍāmbudhau mām atho
majjantīm udatārayan manasijo devaḥ sa mūrcchāguruḥ
kiṃ tasya tat sakhi nirūpitam aṅgam aṅgam |
anyāpi kiṃ na sakhi bhājanam īdṛśīnāṃ
vairī na ced bhavati vepathur antarāyaḥ

keśaṭasya | (amaru 55; su.ra. 1640; sū.mu. 86.14; SD 3.105 mada; Daśa
                            2.22, etc.; padyā. 302, dāmodarasya; bha.ra.si. 2.4.165)
prayacchāhāraṃ me yadi tava rahovṛttam akhilaṃ
mayā vācyaṃ noccair iti gṛhaśuke jalpati śanaiḥ |
krīḍāśārikayā nilīya nibhṛtaṃ trotuṃ bhayārtāṃ vadhūṃ
bimbaṃ dehi nitambini tvadalakaśyāmaṃ ca me jāmbavam |
tat prātar gurusannidhau nigadatas tasyopahāraṃ vadhūḥ |
kṣuṇṇāny eva tamāṃsi kintu dadhati prauḍhi na samyagdṛśor
vāsaḥ saṃvṛttam eva kintu jahati prāṇeśvaraṃ nābalāḥ |
sākūtaṃ rutam eva kintu sahasā jhātkṛtya noḍḍīyate
patyau pātre kalānāṃ vrajati gativaśād astam indau krameṇa
tārāṇāṃ viralo’dhunā parikaraḥ smeraṃ nabho vartate
apāstas tārābhir vidhana iva kāmī yuvatibhir
dhatte padmalatādalepsur upari khaṃ karṇatālaṃ dvipaḥ
śaṣpastambarasān niyacchati śikhī madhye śikhaṇḍaṃ śiraḥ |
mātaṅgaḥ karaśīkarair nijavaśāṃ siñcan śramārtāṃ muhur
tāpāt piṇḍitavigraheva viśati cchāyā tarūṇāṃ tale
dvitraiḥ svedalavair udañcitam aho sūryo lalāṭaṃ tapaḥ
didṛkṣābhir devo ravir atha rathaṃ mantharayati
cchavir asau bimbaṃ vindan diśaṃ bhṛśam appateḥ |
śirasi śirasi svairaṃ svairaṃ patanti patattriṇaḥ
aho rāgavatī sandhyā jahāti svayam ambaram
vāsālayam iva jaladhiṃ rāgī purato ravir viśati
nāstaṃ drāg eti bhānur nivasati nalinībodhanidrāntarāle |
akṣṇor mañjulam añjanaṃ caraṇayor nīlāśmajau nūpurā
yatprītyā pariśīlitaṃ paradṛśāṃ rodhāya tat sāṃprataṃ
nepathyasya vidhāv apīdam asatījātasya jātaṃ tamaḥ
tīre nīranidhes tamālaviṭapicchāyāṃ ca sāyaṃ śanair
yas trailokyajitaḥ smarasya kim api krīḍātaḍāgaṃ mahad
devaḥ prācīm idānīm ayam upacinute pañcabāṇasya so’yaṃ
bibhrāṇaḥ śāṇalīlām amṛtarucir imāṃ lākṣikībhiḥ prabhābhiḥ |
ālimpann ayam udgatair divam imāṃ karpūrapūraṃ sṛjan |
haṃsāḥ saṃprati pakṣatau sunibhṛtaṃ kṛtvā śiraḥ śerate
jyotsnābhis tṛṣitāḥ samaṃ sahacaraiḥ suptāś cakorastriyaḥ |
ghūrṇadbhiḥ kumudodareṣv api madhukṣīvaiḥ sthitaṃ ṣaṭpadair
apy uccair giriśṛṅgamūrdhani bhṛśaṃ niryānty amī barhiṇaḥ
kiṃ ca trīṇi jaganti jiṣṇudivasair dvitrair manojanmano
devasyāpi cirojjhitaṃ yadi bhaved abhyāsavaśyaṃ dhanuḥ
dināni sphāyante ravir api athaṃ mantharayati |
karṇākarṇikayā mithaḥ katham amī ghūrṇanti viśvedhvagāḥ |
dvitraiḥ kvāpi kila śrutāśrutam api spaṣṭāny apuṣṭārutaṃ
yātaṃ mānair vadhūnām iva daraśithilagranthibhiḥ pūrvapatrair
jāto’pi kvāpi bālāmadana iva bahir nāṅkuro vyaktim eti |
nītvā nītvā navoḍhā iva vacanam amūḥ kokilāḥ kuṇṭhayanti
kīrāḥ pakvaphalāśayā madhukarīś cumbanti muñcanti ca |
eteṣām api paśya kiṃśukataroḥ patrair abhinnatviṣāṃ
drumālīnāṃ yūnor mana iva sarāgaṃ kisalayaṃ
caitraś citram akāṇḍa eva samabhūt trailokyamallo bhaṭaḥ
cūtānāṃ kalikāmilan madhulihāṃ kāpi sthitir vartate |
kiṃ cānyat kusumāyudho’dya bhagavān dhatte sagarvaṃ dhanur
jyām unmārṣṭi ca pañcabhiś ca viśikhair jetuṃ jagad vāñchati
vardhante ca vivardhayanti ca muhus te’mī smaraṃ vāsarāḥ
ete samprati vaimanasyam aniśaṃ niḥśaṅkam ātanvate
ito’py eṣa śrīmān aviralam idānīṃ mukulitaḥ
sāmyaṃ samprati sevate vicakilaṃ ṣāṇmāsikair mauktikair
māñjiṣṭhair mukulaiś ca pāṭalitaror vṛttaiva kācil lipiḥ
śyāmaṃ dhūmaiḥ sa khalu kurute kānanaṃ korakākhyaiḥ |
tataḥ strīṇāṃ hanta kṣamam adharakāntiṃ kalayituṃ
kaṇṭhadhvānajuṣo haranti hṛdayaṃ madhye vanaṃ kokilāḥ |
hotuṃ prāṇān ṛcam iva pikaḥ sāmidhenīm adhīte
na ḍaukante pātuḥ jhaṭiti makarandaṃ madhulihaḥ
prānte paṅkini pallavasya viluṭhan pautrī nayaty ātapāṃs
tṛṣṇālur nibhṛtaṃ hradeṣu mahiṣaḥ śaivālam anviṣyati |
kṣoṇī śuṣyati bālukā ca saritāṃ vahnisphuliṅgāyate
strīṇām aṅge vibhajati tapas tatra tatrātmacihnam
veśaś ced ayam aṅganāsu na tadānaṅgasya ke kiṅkarāḥ
bhavanti ca himopamāḥ stanabhuvo yad eṇīdṛśāṃ
śucer upari saṃsthito ratipateḥ prasādo guruḥ
haṭhāl lūnoṣmāṇaḥ kam api mahimānaṃ vidadhate
ārohaty avanīruhaḥ praviśati śvabhraṃ nagaiḥ spardhate
khaṃ vyāleḍhi viceṣṭate kṣititale kuñjodare līyate |
antar bhrāmyati koṭarasya viramaty ālambate vīrudhaḥ
kiṃ tad yan na karoti mārutavaśaṃ yātaḥ kṛśānur vane
svairaṃ sarpan sṛjati gagane gatvarān patrabhaṅgān
bāle māleyam uccair na bhavati gaganavyāpinī nīradānāṃ
kiṃ tatpakṣmāntapātair malinayasi mudhā vaktram aśrupravāhaiḥ |
dāvāgneḥ sampravṛddhā malinayati diśāṃ maṇḍalaṃ dhūmalekhā
netuṃ vāñchati nīḍa eva divasaṃ garbhālasā vāyasī
rakto nīpalatāsu bhuktavirasām ujjhaty aliḥ pāṭalam |
tejaḥ samprati saṃharanti śikhino dagdhavyāpāraṃ gatā
jambūm āmravanād upait śanakair āsannapākāṃ pikaḥ
chatrīkṛtya mṛdāṃ tvacaḥ sthalabhuvo niryanti śaṣpāṅkurāḥ |
kekābhiḥ kakubhāṃ mukhāni śikhino vācālayanty utsukāḥ
grīṣmeṇāpasṛtaṃ kvacit kvacid api nyastāni vastūny api |
staimityaṃ manaso diśaty anibhṛtaṃ dhārādhare mūrcchati |
utsaṅge kakubho nidhāya rasitair ambhomucāṃ ghorayan
nākṣṇor vartmani śītadīdhitir asau nāpi tviṣām īśvaraḥ |
bhagnāv eva malīmasaiḥ kim adhunā nirmātum arthāntaraṃ
yat sāndraṃ karakāḥ patanti yad amī muñcanti vidyucchaṭāḥ
dūrīkṛtya ca nūpurāv iva ripūn haṃsān samutkūjato
yātāḥ kvāpy abhisārikā iva diśo meghāgame sotsukāḥ
bhittīr jāgrati yāmikā iva dhanuṣmantaḥ svananto ghanāḥ
kva sampraty uṣṇāṃśur gata iti samanveṣaṇaparās

oṃkaṇṭhasya | (su.ra. 251 kasyacit, śā.pa. 3869, sū.mu. 61.18 both
                            pāṇineḥ)
asau nāstīvenduḥ kvacid api raviḥ proṣita iva
ahar vā rātrir vā dvayam api viluptapravicayaṃ
ghanair baddhavyūhaiḥ kim idam iti ghoraṃ vyavasitam
vyāptāny unmadakukkubhāni saritāṃ kurvanti lolaṃ manaḥ
bhidyante svayam eva yeṣu viṣamā mānagrahagranthayaḥ
krūrāḥ pānthavadhūbhir adbhutam amī soḍhāḥ kathaṃ vāsarāḥ
na pratyemi janasya yad virahiṇo yāsyanti soḍhuṃ niśāḥ
śubhrābhraṃ gaganaṃ kvacit pravikasat kāśā vanālī kvacit
dhūmraiḥ pakṣapuṭaiḥ patadbhir abhitaḥ pāṇḍūdaraiḥ khañjanair
āyāntīṃ śaradaṃ kiranti rabhasāl lājair ivāśāṅganāḥ |
haṃsānāṃ nivaheṣu yaiḥ kavalitair āsajyate kūjatām
parāvṛttā haṃsāḥ sapadi vigataṃ kalmaṣam apāṃ
diśo dīrghībhūtā gaganam asivarṇaṃ ca vipulaṃ
ity uccakaiḥ śarad iyaṃ vahatīva tāpam
kāmī daridra iva śoṣam upaiti paṅkaḥ
candrāṅkaḥ śāradas te jayakṛd upanato vidviṣāṃ kālakālaḥ
svacchā veṇir madayati manaḥ śāradīnāṃ nadīnām
etāḥ saṃprati tā vibhānty akulaṣāḥ kṣāmābhirāmāṅgikāḥ
kaṃcit kālaṃ naṭati nikaṭe khañjarīṭaḥ priyāyāḥ
śarajjanyāḥ svairaṃ hasitam iva harṣād aviratam |
iha hi śaradi kṣīvaḥ pakṣau vidhūya milan mudā
madayati rahaḥ kuñije mañjusthalīm adhi khañjanaḥ
garvāyante palālaṃ prati pathikaśataiḥ pāmarāḥ stūyamānā
bhartur māndyaśuceva hanta divasaḥ kṣīṇo’py ayaṃ kṣīyate
pākaṃ yatra na yāti pāṇijabhdiā yatrātiśītārtibhir
ākruṣṭās taṭinīṣu kokamithunair yāvan niśīthaṃ mithaḥ |
yeṣāṃ no kaṇṭhalagnā kṣaṇam api tuhinakṣodadakṣā mṛgākṣī
teṣām āyāmiyāmā yamasadanasamā yāminī yāti yūnām
dviguṇībhūtā rajanī vṛddheva śanaiḥ śanair yāti
sthāne rūpam anuttamaṃ sukṛtinā dānena karṇo jitaḥ |
ity ālokya ciraṃ dṛśā kṛpaṇayā dūrāgatena stutaḥ
āhūto hālikenāśrutam iva vacanaṃ tasya kṛtvā kṣaṇaikaṃ
tiṣṭhāsustabdharomā katham api viṭapaṃ niḥsamīraṃ vihāya |
tyaktvā śālicikartiṣām ita ito dhāvanty amī pāmarāḥ
mātar dharmapare dayāṃ kuru mayi śrānte ca vaideśike
svairaṃ saṃcarati pradoṣamaruti tv aṅgattuṣāre jarat
bāḍhaṃ vinyasya bāhudvayam urasi raṇaddantapaṅktiḥ samantāt |
pānthas taptvā prasuptaḥ pratatatanutṛṇe dhāmani grāmadevyāḥ |
vāte vāti prakamaṃ himakaṇini kaṇan koṇataḥ koṇam eti
kampante kapayo bhṛśaṃ jaḍakṛśaṃ gojāvikaṃ glāyati
śvā cullīkuharodaraṃ kṣaṇam api kṣipto’pi naivojjhati |
śītārtivyasanāturaḥ punar ayaṃ dīno janaḥ kūrvavat
svāny aṅgāni śarīra eva hi nije nihnotum ākāṅkṣati
ucchindanty adha eva bandhuratayā kolīphalāny arbhakāḥ |
śrayante sīmānaḥ kim api kamanīyatvam adhunā |
prathante plakṣāṇām api ca kuṭilāḥ kānanabhuvāṃ
itthaṃ karoti kim asau svapatas tuṣāraḥ
aṅke kuṅkumapiñjarā ca ramaṇī pūgaṃ mukhe nūtanaṃ
syāc cetad vidhivañcitaḥ spṛhayati prāvārabhārāya kaḥ
saṃbhogāya bhavanti cātra kṛtināṃ dīptā viśālāgnayaḥ
paśyāmo mayi kiṃ prapadyata iti sthairyaṃ mayālambitaṃ
kiṃ mām ālapatīty ayaṃ khala śaṭhaḥ kopas tayāpy āśritaḥ |
savyājaṃ hasitaṃ mayā dhṛtiharo bāṣpas tu muktas tayā
nivṛtte sadbhāve jana iva jane gacchati puraḥ |
tad utprekṣyotprekṣya priyasakhi gatāṃs tāṃś ca divasān
na jāne ko hetur dalati śatadhā yan na hṛdayam

tasyaiva | (amaru 38, su.ra. 697, Sbh 1141, śā.pa. 3545, sū.mu. 84.1,
                            Rask 2.263c)
śliṣṭaḥ kaṇṭhe kim iti na mayā mūḍhayā prāṇanāthaś
cumbaty asmin vadanavidhutiḥ kiṃ kṛtā kiṃ na dṛṣṭaḥ |
paścāt tāpaṃ vahati taruṇī premṇi jāte rasajñā
yāvat tvaccaritaṃ prasaṅgata iva prastaumi tāvat tvayā
vande tān aham ity udīrya śirasā nyastaḥ praṇāmāñjaliḥ |
tad yāvac ca ruṣeva doṣam api te pṛcchāmi nābhāṣya māṃ
niḥśvāsaiḥ kiyad aṃśubhiś ca kiyad ākhyātaṃ tavāgastayā
api kāryagatī deśāśrayau ca dānaṃ daridrabharaṇaṃ ca |
kīrtiḥ savīryakīrtiḥ praśastakīrtiś ca kīrtigītiś ca
pādau vāṃ praṇato’smi sādhu vadataṃ kṣatraprasūtī yuvām |
kālindi brūhi kubhodbhavajaladhir ahaṃ nāma gṛhṇāsi kasmāc
chatror me narmadāhaṃ tvam api vadasi me nāma kasmāt sapatnyāḥ |
mālinyaṃ tarhi kasmād anuharasi milatkajjalair mālavīnāṃ
bāṣpāmbhobhiḥ kim āsāṃ samajani kupitaḥ kuntalakṣoṇipālaḥ
muktāsmābhir na ko’pi smarapadam avanau saṃstutaḥ satyam etat |
mithayitad bhoḥ kathaṃ re nanu śatam akṛthāḥ kuntalendrasya tat tat
kāvyastotrāṇi dhik tvāṃ jaḍamaya na manor eva mūrtiprabhedaḥ
krūre kadru kim āttha dāsi vinate muktāsmi dattvāmṛtaṃ
tenānāyi sudhā mudhā tṛṇaliho nāgās tvayā vañcitāḥ |
tvatpāpair musitāḥ sutāḥ śṛṇu tṛṇaṃ dattvādya yāvan mukhe
pūrvaḥ kṛtātmanām asi bhagnānāṃ samiti paścimo dviṣatām |
tvaṃ dakṣiṇaḥ praṇamatāṃ tathāpi sarvottaras tvam asi
yasya dvīpaṃ dharitrī sa ca jaladhir abhūd yasya gaṇḍūṣatoyaṃ
tasyāścaryaikamūrter api nabhasi vapur yatra durlakṣyam āsīt |
tatpītaṃ tvadyaśobhis tribhuvanam abhajaṃs tāni viśrāmahetos
tac cāntaḥ kaiṭabhāreḥ sa ca tava hṛdaye vandanīyas tvam eva
na lopo varṇānāṃ na khalu parataḥ pratyayavidhir
vikāro nāsty eva kvacid api na bhagnāḥ prakṛtayaḥ |
guṇo vā vṛddhir vā satatam upakārāya jagatāṃ
muner dākṣīputrād api tava samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ
tvaṃ ṣāḍguṇyajuṣāṃ śiromaṇir asi traiguṇyamūrter asāv
indus tatra ca ṣoḍaśa tvayi catuḥṣaṣṭhir valante kalāḥ |
tasyaikaṃ nanu maṇḍalaṃ tava nava kṣmāmaṇḍalīsiddhayas
tejaś candramaso nṛcandra bhavataś caivaṃ davīyo’ntaram
pīyūṣaṃ viṣam apy asūta jaladhiḥ kānteḥ kalaṅkasya ca
sthānaṃ śītaruciḥ svabhāvakaṭhino dātā ca kalpadrumaḥ |
vācaṃ niṣprathayanti meyam akhilaṃ puṣṇanti muṣṇanti ca
saubhāgyaṃ duhate śriyaṃ vidadhati śvaḥ śreyase tanvate
bhindanti bhramamuktayas tava satām aṣṭau mahāsiddhayaḥ
jātāḥ smaḥ prativeśinaḥ padavidāṃ jānanti naḥ śrotriyāḥ
ṣaṭkarmādhvani gacchatāṃ ca viduṣāṃ sārthe prapannā vayam |
dṛṣṭāḥ smaḥ kavividyayā mukulitair natratribhāgaiś ciraṃ
kiṃ vidmaḥ kiyad anyathāstu nikaṣagrāvā bhavādṛgjanaḥ
agrāhyaṃ śravaṇasya bhūṣaṇam alaṅkāro na bhāvocitaḥ
kaścid vāco racayitum alaṃ voḍhum evāparas tāḥ
sā kalyāṇī matir ubhayathā vismaye nas tanoti |
ābālyādhigamān mayaiva gamitaḥ koṭiṃ parām unnater
yātas tīratapovanāni bhavato vṛddho guṇānāṃ gaṇaḥ
sūryo dhāmavatāṃ na kiṃ na kim ayaṃ prahlādakaś candramā
gambhīro na kim ambudhiḥ kṣitibhṛtāṃ rāmaḥ sa jetā na kim |
kiṃ tv ekaikaguṇastutau na hi vayaṃ śaktās tad etadgaṇa
śrotṬṇāṃ sumahotsavāya nṛpate tvām ekam eva stumaḥ
prāleyācalabandhavas tava guṇāḥ kair neha karṇārpitāḥ
prītyā ca śrutikautukena ca balād ākṛṣyamāṇaḥ svayam |
ekaṃ saṃnatapakṣma pannagapatir dhatte sahasraṃ dṛśām
merur daṇḍo yadi ca paṭalaṃ medinīmaṇḍalaṃ syāc
cheṣaḥ sūtraṃ samadharaṇam apy eṣa vindhyo mahīdhraḥ |
tan mātā ca tripuravijayī keśavo vā yadā syād
bhrāntaṃ yena caturbhir eva caraṇaiḥ satyābhidhāne yuge
tretāyāṃ tribhir aṅghribhiḥ katham api dvābhyāṃ tato dvāpare |
na syās tvaṃ yadi deva paṅgulaguṅdaḥ kāle kalāv utkale
so’yaṃ paṅgur avasthitaikacaraṇo dharmaḥ kathaṃ bhrāmyati
ucchann eva kalau vṛṣasya caraṇaśreṇī navīnāṃ punas
tāṃ nirmāya kṛtas tvayā punar api nyastaḥ padasyandanaḥ |
śrutvānūrurasau vihāya mihiraṃ tvāṃ deva seviṣyate
apy andhaṃkaraṇauṣadhair iva pade netre ca jātavyathaiḥ |
āstām ākramituṃ vilokitum api vyaktaṃ na śaktaḥ kaliḥ
yuktaṃ saṃcaraṇaṃ yad atra bhavataś candreṇa rātrāv api |
mā bhūc ceyam arundhatī bhagavatī duḥśīlatābhājanam
āvaktrendu tadaṅgam eva sṛjataḥ sraṣṭuḥ samagras tviṣāṃ
śeṣaḥ keśamayaḥ kim andhatamasastomair abhūn nirmitaḥ
na dhyāyantu kathaṃ nu deva kathaya tvām ekam eṇīdṛśaḥ
kiṃ vātena vilaṅghitā na na mahābhūtārditā kiṃ na na
śrāntā kiṃ na na saṃnnipātalaharīpraccharditā kiṃ na na |
tat kiṃ muhyati roditi śvasiti ca smeraṃ ca dhatte mukhaṃ
dṛṣṭaḥ kiṃ katham apy akāraṇaripuḥ śrībhojadevo’nayā
te kaupīnadhanās ta eva hi paraṃ dhātrīphalaṃ bhuñjate
teṣāṃ dvāri nadanti vājinivahās tair eva labdhā kṣitiḥ |
tair etat samalaṅkṛtaṃ nijakulaṃ kiṃ vā bahu brūmahe
ye dṛṣṭāḥ parameśvareṇa bhavatā tuṣṭena ruṣṭena vā
vālmīkeḥ katamo’si kas tvam athavā vyāsasya yenaiṣa bhoḥ
dorbhyāṃ sāgaram uttitīrṣasi yadi brūmaḥ kim atrottaram
atyuccāḥ paritaḥ sphuranti girayaḥ sphārās tathāmbhodhayas
tān etān api bibhratī kim api na klāntāsi tubhyaṃ namaḥ |
āścaryeṇa punaḥ punaḥ stutim imāṃ prastaumi yāvad bhuvas
tāvad vibhrad imāṃ smṛtas tava bhujo vācas tato mudritāḥ
mithyā deva bhujena te’lpavibhavaḥ kalpadrumaḥ spardhate
cintyas tatra bhavān sakalpaviṭapī yasyaitad ekārṇave
kalpānte viniveśya viśvam akhilaṃ chāyāsu śete hariḥ
śailendro daśakandhareṇa tulitas taṃ cārjuno hehayaḥ
kārādhāmni babandha tasya ca bhujāraṇyaṃ muniś chinnavān |
pārśvasthābhiḥ priyābhir madavikalapadaṃ yat tad apy ucyamānaiḥ |
kṣuṇṇāsu kṣitiṣu kṣipann iva yaśaḥ kṣauṇījabījavrajam
vedoddhāraparaḥ karas tava paraṃ dānāmbupūtaḥ stutaḥ |
kintu kṣmātilaka kṣamasva kavibhiḥ kiṃ nāma nālokyate
dṛṣṭaḥ spaṣṭataraṃ tavāpi nibhṛtaḥ pāṇau sa vaisāriṇaḥ
teṣām alpataraḥ sa kalpaviṭapī teṣāṃ na cintāmaṇiś
cintām apy upayāti kāmasurabhis teṣāṃ na kāmāspadam |
prāyaścittam ivācaran narapatiḥ ko nāma no pupluve
vyāptām apy avanīm aṭanti ripavas tyaktātapatrāḥ
sragdāmāno yad īyaṃ caraṇam aśaraṇāḥ paryupāsan narendrāḥ
svāmin muñja kim ity amuṃ janam upaspraṣṭum
mārge pallavitaṃ puraṃ praviśataḥ śākhāśatair udgatam |
bhrātar bhāvini darśane mukulitaṃ dṛṣṭe tu deve tvayi
protphullaṃ phalitaṃ ca samprati manorājyadrumeṇādya me
dvīndraṃ bhāti jagattridhāma gaganaṃ viśvaṃ caturdaivataṃ
pañcāmnāyam idaṃ ca vāṅmayamayaṃ ṣaṭsāyako manmathaḥ |
pratyarthikṣitipāla pālaka satāṃ dṛṣṭo’si tuṣṭā vayam
maulau dhāraya puṇḍarīkam amitaṃ tanvātmano vikramaṃ
cakrāṅkaṃ vaha pādapadmam avaniṃ doṣṇā samabhyuddhara |
viśvāntaḥkaraṇaikacaura tad api jñāto hariḥ khalv asi
eko brūte prathamanihataṃ kaiṭabhaṃ kaṃsam anyaḥ
sa tvaṃ tattvaṃ kathaya bhavatā ko hatas tatra pūrvam
haste kalpataruṃ mukhe himakaraṃ bāhvor anantāhvayaṃ
roṣe tat kila kālakūṭagaralaṃ toṣe haripreyasīm |
ojasyāvṛṇu nāma vāḍavam imām udghāṭya maryāditāṃ
ghoṣo’yaṃ tava nīradhe vanapate chadmāvatāre śramaḥ
unnidreṇa mayādya cintitam abhūd yatrāvatārā harer
ākhyātā daśa kīrtito’si na kathaṃ tatra tvam ekādaśaḥ |
tvaccāritram agocaraṃ kavigirāṃ jānann api kṣmāpate
na prastaumi bhayena bhāratakaveḥ kas tādṛśaṃ vakṣyati
bhūtyā rajjaya viśvam udvaha nakhacchadmārdhacandraṃ padaṃ
dṛṣṭiṃ dhehi hṛdi sphuṭaṃ bhava vṛṣādhāro dvijihvaṃ tyaja |
santaḥ kaṇṭakitāḥ kathaṃ yadi kṛtā niṣkaṇṭakā medinī
prakhyātā yadi te guṇāḥ katham atha prastauti doṣaṃ janaḥ |
nītāvādyadhurandharo yadi bhavān kasmād anītiḥ prajā
vṛttaṃ deva na citram eva hi na cec citraṃ vidhatte katham
kṣauṇīndra tyajati kṣamāṃ tvayi raṇe doḥśālino’py akṣamāḥ
pratarthiṣv atha kampamānatanuṣu tvaṃ cāpi kampākulaḥ |
tvaṃ gṛhṇāsi bhuvaḥ karaṃ mṛgadṛśām ete’pi ca svarbhuvāṃ
tebhyas tebhyo’dhikaṃ nu kiṃ guṇibhir apy udgīyate yad bhavān
ekas tridhā hṛdi sadā vasasīti citraṃ
yo vidviṣāṃ ca viduṣāṃ ca mṛgīdṛśāṃ ca |
tāpaṃ ca saṃmadarasaṃ ca ratiṃ ca tanvan
śauryoṣmaṇā ca vinayena ca līlayā ca
tvaṃ dvitrāṇi padāni gacchasi mahīm ullaṅghya yānti dviṣas
tvaṃ bāṇān daśa pañca muñcasi bahūny astrāṇi muñcanti te |
te devīpatayas tavāsi nihatās tvaṃ mānuṣīṇāṃ patis
te nindyās tava varṇanaṃ katham iti śrīkarṇaṃ nirṇīyatām
karṇaḥ sarvaśirogatas tribhuvane karṇena kiṃ na śrūtaṃ
viśrāmyanti mṛgīdṛśām api dṛśaḥ karṇe na citraṃ kvacit |
āścaryaṃ punar etad eva yad ayaṃ niśchidrasanmaṇḍalaḥ
pṛthur asi guṇaiḥ kīrtyā rāmo nalo bharato bhavān
mahati samare śatrughnas tvaṃ sadaiva yudhiṣṭhiraḥ |
katham asi na māndhātā deva trilokavidhāyy api
tvaṃ cen nātha kalānidhiḥ śaśadharas tat toyanāthā vayaṃ
maryādānidhir ambhasāṃ patir atha tvaṃ ced vayaṃ vāridāḥ |
sarvāśāparipūrako jaladharas tvaṃ ced vayaṃ bhūruhaḥ
sanmārgasthitiviśrutas tvam iti cec chākhī vayaṃ cādhvagāḥ
deva preyajanas tavaiva bhavato bhartavyatāṃ vāñchati |
nanv etanmaraṇān na kiṃ nu maraṇaṃ kāyān manovicyuti
dīrghaṃ jīva manas tvadaṅghrikamale kāyo’tra naḥ kevalam
sevyaś cintāmaṇir vā suratarur athavā rohaṇo vā girīṇāṃ
ekaś caitanyaśūnyas tyajati kaṭhinatāṃ nāparaś chedakhedaṃ
dhatte’nyaḥ kiṃnarāṇām adhipatir aparaḥ kas tvayābhyarthanīyaḥ
prītas tvaṃ vedavādair mama tu niravadhir nātha nirvedavādaḥ
sākūtas tvaṃ kalāsu pratidinavikalā vṛttir ekā mamaiva |
sādhyas tvaṃ bhāvaśuddhyā mama tu vijayate ko’py abhāvas tad itthaṃ
līlārāmo guṇānāṃ mama viguṇanidheḥ kaur upāyair upāsyaḥ
bhartāraṃ punar ekam eva hi bhuvas tvām eva manyāmahe |
colaṃ prāpya ca madhyadeśam acirāt kāñcyāṃ karaḥ pātitaḥ
coladhvaṃsanam aṅgamardanam api drāg eva sampādyate |
nirjityaiva ca madhyadeśam acirāt kāñcyāṃ karaḥ pātito
nitvaivaṃ vaśatāṃ priyeṇa bhavatābhīkena bhūr bhujyate
deva tvaṃ kila kuntalagraharuciḥ kāñcīm apāsārayan
kṣiptaḥ kṣiptakaragrahaḥ prahaṇanaṃ prārabdham aṅgeṣv api |
bhrūkṣepād gauḍalakṣmīṃ jayati vijayate kelimātrāt kaliṅgāṃś
cetaś cedikṣitīndos tapati vitapate sūryavad durjaneṣa |
svecchān mlecchān vināśaṃ nayati vinayate kāmarūpābhimānaṃ
kāśībhartuḥ prakāśaṃ harati viharate mūrdhni yo māgadhasya
tvaṃ colollolalīlāṃ kalayasi kuruṣe karṣaṇaṃ kuntalānāṃ
tvaṃ kāñcinyañcanāya prabhavati rabhasād aṅgasaṅgaṃ karoṣi |
itthaṃ rājendra vandistutibhir upahitotkampam evādya dīrghaṃ
nārīṇām apy arīṇāṃ hṛdayam udayate tvatpadārādhanāya
katiṣu na kṛtā sevā ke vā na vāgvibhavaiḥ stutās
tṛṇam api guṇaprītaḥ prādān na ko’pi vipaścitām |
vāsaḥ svarṇagṛheṣu sakhyam amaraiḥ kalpadrumāṇāṃ vane
krīḍā svargavadhūgaṇaiḥ saha sudhākaṇṭhaṃ mudā pīyate |
ruṣṭenedam akāri deva bhavatā hatvā raṇe vairiṇāṃ
tuṣṭaḥ preṣyajanāya vedmi na paraṃ gauḍendra kiṃ dāsyasi
tvannetre’pi tavānane’pi bhavataḥ pāṇāv api tvatpade’py
yannītā nijabhāvam arthibhir asau tvaddṛṣṭipātais tvadā
prāg āsīn naranātha saṃprati punas teṣāṃ tavānugrahāt |
sūkṣmebhyas tava sandiśanti suciraṃ jīva prasanne tvayi |
paurāḍhyāś ca purīḥ śmaśānavasater bhikṣābhujo’py akṣamā
lakṣmīṃ na vyatanod daridrabharaṇeṣv ajño hi senānvayaḥ
puṣpai rūpyāṇi ratnaṃ pariṇatibhiduraiḥ kukṣibhir dāḍimīnām |
dātuṃ nātha sadā samīhitaphalaṃ lagno’si netre’rthināṃ
baddhas tarhi cirāya rohaṇagireṣ ṭaṅkavraṇer aṅkuraḥ
satyasminn atidānabhāji katham apy āstāṃ sa kalpadrumaḥ |
jāne vikramavardhana tvayi dhanaṃ viśrāṇayaty arthināṃ
bhāvī śoṇa ivopalair upacito ratnair agādho’mbudhiḥ |
ādhivyādhir na khalu rajanīṃ prāpya bhāvī punas te |
dānair nānyaḥ kalaya kurute kāṃcanādreḥ samāptir
anviṣyadbhir ayaṃ cirāt katham api prārthyeta yady arthibhir
nātha tvaṃ punar arthinaḥ pratidinaṃ yatnāt samanviṣyasi |
tvām ālokya vidīryate yadi na tadgrāvaiva cintāmaṇiḥ
nistejaś ca nirāśrayaṃ ca nikhilaṃ tadrājakaṃ vartate
ttavyaṃ ḍhaukitam eva so’ham adhunā jāto’smi niṣkiñcanaḥ |
prātas taptakuṭhāram eṣa vahate deva tvadagre’mbudhiḥ
soḍhā kas tava deva kopakuṭilaṃ bhrūkārmukaṃ bhūpatiḥ
yady aṅkeṣu karāḥ śataṃ pratikaraṃ yady aṅgulīnāṃ śataṃ
pratyekaṃ yadi parvasandhiṣu bhavanty etāsu rekhāḥ śatam |
śakyante nipuṇais tadā gaṇayituṃ yena svadorvikramair
utkhātāḥ kati ropitāḥ kati kati vyāpāditāḥ kṣmābhujaḥ
śikṣante cāṭuvādān vidadhati yavasān ānane kānaneṣu
bhrāmyanti jyākiṇāṅkaṃ vidadhati śibiraṃ kurvate parvateṣu
samāje samrājāṃ sadasi viduṣāṃ dhāmni dhanināṃ
nikāye nīcānām api ca ramaṇīnāṃ pariṣadi |
kathaṃcid yatra smaḥ kṣaṇam itathayas tatra śṛṇumaḥ
daivena tvadares tavāpi sadṛśī prāyaḥ parājeṣyate
nānyeneti kila dvayor api lipir nyastāḥ lalāṭe dhruvam |
bhūyān arthakṛtas tu samprati tayor bhedo’yam unmīlati
sthāne pauruṣam āśrayanti kṛtino daive nirasyādaram
vāhū dvāv idam ekam eva bhuvanaṃ kas tatra vīro rasaḥ
sāmrājyasya ca pūrvapūruṣabhujakṣuṇṇasya kiṃ na priyam |
yasyātmāpi na mānino bahumataḥ kutretare kṣatriyāḥ
bhīṣmaḥ klībakatāṃ dadhāra samiti droṇena muktaṃ dhanur
mithyā dharmasutena jalpitam abhūd duryodhano durmadaḥ |
chidreṣv eva dhanañjayasya vijayaḥ karṇaḥ pramādī tataḥ
śrīmann asti na bhārate’pi bhavato yaḥ pauruṣair vardhate
tvaṃ yasmād ayaśas ta eva samiti trasto na śastrakṣatais
kaḥ śailān gilati kṣamāṃ calayati kṣārāmbudhau dhāvati
ko vā cumbati sūryabimbam analajvālāṃ samāliṅgati |
aṅgair yuktaṃ yad ete himagiriśikharotsaṅgam īyur narendrāḥ |
kiṃ tu tvacchauryalīlām anuharati puraḥ siṃhayūnāṃ nikāye
tatrāpy ātaṅkabhājaḥ kva nanu vidhihatāḥ sthairyam āsādayanti
kūrmaḥ pādo’sya yaṣṭir bhujagapatir asau bhājanaṃ bhūtadhātrī
kāsām asya na sa pratāpatapanaḥ pāraṃ girāṃ gāhate
aurvaś cāgniriraṃmadaś ca bhavataś caiṣa pratāpānalaḥ |
ādyo mādyati vāribhir jalanidher ambhomucāṃ madhyamaḥ
jagrāha pratirājakaṃ vanam abhi kruddhaḥ pratāpānalaḥ
śuṣyanty eva payodhayo na maṇayaḥ kuryuḥ padaṃ ced adhaḥ
śuṣyaty aṇḍam apīdam ambujabhuvo mantrā bhaveyur na cet |
kiṃ caite kaṇaśaḥ sphuṭanti girayo dadhyur na ced auṣadhīs
tejobhis tava deva bhūr api bhujacchāyāsu viśrāmyati
yac cakre bhujendrasadmasu tamaś chedaṃ na tatrādbhutam |
pītvā sāndratamaṃ tamas timirahā devaḥ prasūte yamaṃ
kālindīṃ ca śanaiścaraṃ ca timirāhārānusārād iva |
ekaṃ dhāma śamīṣu līnam aparaṃ sūryopalajyotiṣāṃ
vārkṣaṃ pārvatam audakaṃ yadi yayus tejāṃsi kiṃ pārthivāḥ
vyomany ulkety araṇye dava iti baḍavāvahnir ity amburāśau
pakṣeṣu kṣmādharāṇāṃ pavir iti taḍid ity ambuvāhāvalīṣu |
bhālotsaṅge purārer nayanam iti punar bhāvikalpāntakāle
kālāgniś ceti deva trijagati bhavanas tejasaḥ sphūrjitāni
prāg evābhram u vallabhasya daśanair bhinno himānīgiriḥ |
itthaṃ deva nijoṣmaṇā tava gajaḥ kṣuṇṇaṃ vapur vījayan
etad deva yaśaskaraṃ narapater yat taskare nigraho
dīrghaṃ jīva yathāparādhamadhuraṃ daṇḍaṃ jagaty āvahan |
baddhaś ca pratidaṇḍabhairavakarī kṣiptaś ca kārāgṛhe
yasyāśābhittijetur madakalakaribhiḥ kvāpi na prāpi raṅgaḥ
ākarṣann iva gāṃ vamann iva khurān paścārdham ujjhann iva
svīkurvann iva khaṃ pibann iva diśaś chāyām amarṣann iva |
sāṅgāraprakarāṃ spṛśann iva dharāṃ vātaṃ sam aśnann iva
śrīmannātha sa vājirāṭ tava kathaṃ mādṛggirāṃ gocaraḥ
dhūlībhir divam andhayanvadhirayann āśāḥ khurāṇāṃ ravair
vātaṃ saṃyati khañjayan javajayaiḥ stotṬn guṇair mūkayan |
sāndrotphālamiṣād vigāyati padā spraṣṭuṃ turaṅgo’pi gām
syāṅghriḥ kvāṅghrir ihāsyatām iti manaś cintānamatkandharaḥ |
utkrośann iva vāridhīn adhicalaty uccais tavāyaṃ hayaḥ
uttrasto’dya punaḥ karoti salilakrīḍāṃ na gauḍādhipaḥ
yadi na śirasi bhargaḥ svargiṇāṃ bhāgadheyair
tejas tejasi līnam astu bhavataḥ kiṃtv anyad ācakṣmahe
sṛṣṭiḥ sraṣṭur ihāstam eṣyati mahābhūtair vinā pañcabhiḥ
nityaṃ nistṛṇapallave pathi nirālambe vrajan vājibhiḥ
yāyād apy avatīrya nirjarapathād eṣā samantān na ced
śeṣaṃ kleśayituṃ diśaḥ sthagayituṃ peṣṭuṃ dharitrībhṛtaḥ
sindhūn dhūlibhareṇa kardamayituṃ tair eva roddhuṃ nabhaḥ |
nāsīre ca muhur muhuś calacalety ālāpakolāhalān
kartuṃ nātha varuthinīyam avanīṃ jetuṃ punas tvadbhujau
kaṭāho’pi svāṅgaṃ kim u kamaṭhanāthaś calayati
deva tvaṃ malayācalo’si bhavataḥ śrīkhaṇḍaśākhī bhusas
tulyā bāṇakṛpāṇayor anugatiḥ kṣīṇānanao na kvacit
koṣaṃ me harati prayacchati sadā lakṣaṃ raṇe patriṇe |
itthaṃ deva kunāyakatvam asakṛd buddhvaiva yuddheṣv asiḥ
kṛtvā sandhim upoḍhavepathur atikrodhād viveśa dviṣaḥ
dvābhyām eva jitaṃ dvayoḥ param amūny aṅgāni bhūmibhara
ślāghyaśrīṇi gṛṇanti samprati bhavatsv aṅgasya kūrmasya ca |
śivā yāyanty uccair aṭati ca kabandhāvalir abhūd
devaḥ svastutir astu nāma hṛdi naḥ sarve ca santvāgamās
tīrthaṃ na kvacid īdṛg atra bhavati tvatkhaḍgadhārā yathā |
yām ekaḥ svaśarīraśuddhirasiko mūrdhnā pratīcchann arir
dvaividhyād anu pañcatāṃ tad anu ca traidaśyam āpa kṣaṇāt
śākhāḥ pañca tavodgatā bhujataros tābhis tathaikaṃ dhṛtaṃ
chāyāṃ kiṃ kathayāmi yatra nikhilaṃ viśrāmyati kṣmātalam
kathaya kuhakāścaryaṃ kvedaṃ kathaṃ kva ca śikṣitam |
udyāty eva suhṛtkulaṃ pratibalaṃ yāty eva nīcaistarām
āyānty eva yaśaḥśriyaḥ pratidiśaṃ yānty eva satkīrtayaḥ |
khaḍgaḥ kṣmāsau vidallaḥ samiti vijayate mālavākhaṇḍalasya
lakṣmīlīlākaṭākṣaḥ partisamaram abhūd yasya jaitraḥ kṛpāṇaḥ
parvāsye viniveśya jāṅgulikatā yair nāma nālambitā
nidrāṇasya kaleḥ sa tasya nṛpateḥ khaḍgo na vāggocaraḥ
jyāṃ bibhradbhujago bhujaṅgamayuvā cāpas tavāsmin punaḥ
bibhrāṇā hṛdayena yaṃ kṣaṇam api kṣoṇībhujo bhejire
yaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ yudhi darśayaty aribhaṭaśreṇīṣu yo vakratām
asminn eva bibharti yaś ca kirati krūradhvaniṃ niṣṭhuraḥ |
doṣaṃ tasya tathāvidhasya bhajataś cāpasya gṛhṇan guṇaṃ
vikhyātaḥ sphuṭam eka eṣa nṛpatiḥ sīmā guṇagrāhiṇām
dhvastāḥ pūrvam atas tadīyadalane saṃbhāvi me duryaśaḥ |
ity ālocya karāmbujārcitam api nyastaṃ purastād api
drāg jātaṃ samareṣu yasya niviḍavrīḍāvinamraṃ dhanuḥ
bhūpānām anapāyapauruṣam iha vyāsena yat kīrtitam |
saṃgrāmāṅgaṇasīmni samyag adhunā deva tvadīyo bhujas
bhūr anyatra samunnatā phaṇipater maulau na vartiṣyate
ambhaḥ kardamatām upaiti sahasā paṅkadravaḥ pāṃśutāṃ
nimnatvaṃ girayaḥ samaṃ viṣamatāṃ śūnyaṃ janasthānatāṃ
niryāte tvayi rājyapāla bhavati tyaktasvabhāvaṃ jagat
vācālatvaṃ dadhānaḥ kavitṛṣu ca guṇaṃ prātibhaṃ sandadhānaḥ |
prātas tyas tūryaghoṣaḥ sthagayati gaganaṃ māṃsalaḥ pāṃśutalpād
utkarṇaṃ kariṇāṃ gaṇena vikasan modaṃ cirād barhibhiḥ
pītaḥ śrotrapuṭena deva paritaḥ prātar mṛdaṅgadhvaniḥ
krodhaṃ dikkariṣu prakampam ariṣu trāsaṃ raver vājiṣu
saṃbhāraṃ sambhramasya tribhuvanam abhito bhūbhṛtāṃ bibhrad uccaiḥ
yasyodyoge balānāṃ diśi diśi valatām ujjihānai rajobhir
dvitrāvaskandamandaḥ katham api calati syandano bhānavīyaḥ
krīḍā digvijaye ca saptajagatībhājo yad akṣauhiṇī
prāyaḥ sambhavati sma bhūparisare bhūyān ivāvagrahaḥ
abdhau majjanti mīnā iva phaṇina iva kṣauṇirandhraṃ viśanti
krāmanty adrīn vihaṅgā iva kapaya iva kvāpy araṇye caranti |
bhūtisnānapramodaṃ tanubhir alabhata spaṣṭam aṣṭābhir īśo
akṣṇāṃ paṃktiśatāni nindati nijaṃ hastadvayaṃ nindati
dīrghāyuḥ prativāsaraṃ pratidiśaṃ vyasto ravir bhrāmyati
haṅkārastutibhir bhaviṣyati kathaṃ na vrīḍito mārutiḥ
saptāmbhodhīn pibadbhir diśi diśi saritaḥ svādayadbhis taḍāga
kīritr velāvaneṣu bhramati bhujam athālambate vīralakṣmīr
kodaṇḍena śarāḥ śarair aśiras tenāpi bhūmaṇḍalaṃ
tena tvaṃ bhavatā ca kīrtir anaghā kīrtyā ca lokatrayam
prāgbhāre khaḍgadhārāṃ saritam iva samuttīrya magnārivaṃśām |
paśyantīyaṃ samantād abhisarati mudā sāṃyugīnaṃ jayaśrīḥ
yan nistriṃśahatodgatair ariśiraś cakrair babhūva kṣaṇaṃ
deva tvadbhujayor balaṃ na gadituṃ vācā vayaṃ śaknumaḥ
kurvāṇā hṛdaye’pi tatpulakitāḥ pratyaṅgam ete vayam |
ślāghante nahi tāni yasya bhujayor adyāpi yuddhasthalī
suptā yasmin ratānte saha ca sahacarair nālavannāganāsā
kṣiptaḥ kṣīragṛhe na dugdhajaladhiḥ koṣe na hemācalo
no vā dikkariṇaḥ kvaṇan madhulihaḥ paryāyaparyāṇana
krīḍāyāṃ viniyojitā vada kṛtaṃ kiṃ kiṃ tvayā digjaye
kiṃ brūmo’nyad ito’dhikaṃ ratir atitrāsān na pauṣpaṃ kare
etenāmī katham iva diśām īśitāro vimuktāḥ |
antarjñātaṃ vapuṣi kalayā tasya te’ṣṭau praviṣṭāḥ
vīrāḥ ke nāma tasmāt trijagati na yayuḥ kṣīṇatāṃ kāṇakubja
nyāyād etena muktāv abhayam abhajatāṃ vāsavo vāsukiś ca
yānty eke parapuṣṭatāṃ balibhujo bhrāmyanti kecin mahīṃ
kecid bibhrati lāvakatvam apare jātā vane vartakāḥ |
tiryaktām api lambhitais tvadaribhir labdhā na pakṣonnatiḥ
saṃtrastāḥ śatravas te katham api rajanīṃ prāvṛṣi prerayanti
padbyām ūruyugaṃ vibhajya bhujayor madhyaṃ nipīḍyorasā
pārśveṣu prasabhaṃ prahṛtya nakharair dantair vilupyādharam |
saṃsuptān avabodhya yuṣmadahitān bhūyo’pi bhuṅkte vane
kiṃ kāntā surataiṣiṇī nahi nahi vyāghrī karālānanā
maukharyaṃ varam astu deva tad api prasūyate vismayād
aiśvaryāṇi parityajanti bhavato nādyāpi te vairiṇaḥ |
manyūnāṃ śatam ācaranti kaṭakaṃ krāmanti bhūmībhṛtāṃ
koṣān geheṣu muñcan pathi karituragaṃ bāndhavān arghamārge
śrutvā yaṃ sahasāgataṃ nijapurāt trāsena nirgacchatāṃ
śubhre sadmani pallaviny upavane vāpyāṃ navāmbhoruhi
krīḍādrau ca saśādvale vivalitagrīvair vimuktā dṛśaḥ
mugdhe kiṃ śukapañjareṇa rasike kiṃ sārakānveṣaṇaiḥ
susthe muñcasi kiṃ na citraphalakaṃ kiṃ vīṇayā rāgiṇi |
vatse mālati mālikā na racitā puṣpais tvadīyair mayā
hā dhik kaṣṭam iti bruvanti nagaratyāge tavāristriyaḥ
mātar mātar janaka janaka preyasi preyasīti
bhrātar bhrātas tanaya tanaya jyāyasi jyāyasīti |
dṛṣṭāḥ pānthajanair vivṛtya sakṛpaṃ hāśabdagarbhair mukhair
nidrāṇā muhur āhatā mhur adhikṣiptā ca śākhāmṛgaiḥ
hā cūtadruma hā priyaṅgulatike tyaktāḥ stha hā dhik katham |
kurvanti ye dinakarasya karās ta eva |
śoṣe kathaṃ pratihatā iti me vitarkaḥ
ke y¨¨uyaṃ munayaḥ kim atra tapase sthānaṃ samīhāmahe
adhākṣīn no laṅkām ayam ayam udanvantam atarad
bhekaṃ mūrdhni nigṛhya kajjalarajaḥśyāmaṃ bhujaṅgaṃ sthitam |
dvāraṃ khaḍgibhir āvṛtaṃ bahir api prasivnnagaṇḍair gajair
antaḥ kañcukibhiḥ sphūran maṇidharair adhyāsitā bhūmayaḥ |
ākrāntaṃ mahiṣībhir eva śayanaṃ tvadvidviṣāṃ mandire
dṛṣṭvā ruṣṭaḥ pratigaja iti tvaddviṣāṃ mandireṣu |
śūnye rājan viḍālas tava ripubhavane mūṣikān ucchinatti
vatse mādhavi tāta campaka śiśo mākanda kaundi priye
hā mātar madayanti hā kuravaka bhrātaḥ khasar mālati |
ity evaṃ ripumandireṣu bhavataḥ śṛṇvanti naktaṃcarā
mūlaṃ phaṇāḥ phaṇipater gaganaṃ ca madhyaḥ
mātuḥ svedamayaṃ tatāna pṛthukaḥ kroḍena dhātryām asau
janmā te yaśasāṃ gaṇas taducitavrīḍo’si tatkīrtane
baddho naiṣa na laṅghito na mathitaḥ pīto na vā bāḍava
deva svasti vayaṃ dvijās tata itas tīrtheṣu niṣkalmaṣāḥ
rodhi kṣmāśodhi śuddhaṃ prasarati yad idaṃ tvadyaśas tat kim āhuḥ |
candrābhair bhavato yaśobhir amalair vistāritāyāṃ diśi
jyotsnāyāṃ tava vairivargavadane viśrāntam andhaṃ tamaḥ |
nyastaṃ cetasi khañjanaiḥ sukavibhiḥ kāvyeṣu saṃcāritam |
utkīrṇaṃ kuśalaiḥ praśastiṣu sadā gītaṃ ca nākeṣadāṃ
ākṣiptā cāmaraśrīḥ prasabham apahṛtaḥ pauṇḍarīko vilāsaḥ
pracchanno vīrakambuḥ samajani vihitaḥ kaṇṭhabhārāya hāraḥ |
lupto hāsaprakāśaḥ kam api paribhavaṃ prāpitaḥ puṣparāśiś
candrābhair yadyaśobhiḥ pratidharaṇibhujāṃ nihnutā kiṃ ca kīrtiḥ
bhūcakraṃ kiyad etad āvṛtam abhūd yad vāmanasyāṅghriṇā
nāgānāṃ kiyad āspadaṃ yadurasā laṅghanti gūḍhāṅghrayaḥ |
ekāhād yad anūrur añcati kiyan mātraṃ tad apy ambaraṃ
yasyetīva yaśo hriyā tribhuvanaṃ vyāpyāpi no tṛpyati
gṛhād gṛham upāgataṃ vrajati pattanaṃ pattanād
vanād dhanam anudrutaṃ bhramati pādapaṃ pādapāt |
girer girim adhiśritaṃ tarati vāridhiṃ vāridher
āste dāmodarīyām iyam udaradarīṃ yāv alambya trilokī
saṃmātuṃ śaknuvanti prathimabharavaśād atra naitad yaśāṃsi |
tām etāṃ pūrayitvā niragur iva madhudhvaṃsinaḥ pāṇḍupadma
kā tvaṃ, kuntalamallakīrtir, ahaha kvāsi sthitā, na kvacit
sakhyas tās tava kutra kutra vada vāg lakṣmīs rucaḥ samprati |
vāg yātā caturānanasya vadanaṃ lakṣmīr murārer uraḥ
kāntir maṇḍalam aindavaṃ mama punar nādyāpi viśrāmabhūḥ
pāraṃ laṅghitavān purā tad adhunā nāścaryam utpādayet |
ekākiny api setubandharahitān saptāpi vārāṃ nidhīn
helābhis tava deva kīrtivanitā yasmāt samullaṅghati
kiṃ vṛttāntaiḥ paragṛhagataiḥ kiṃtu nāhaṃ samarathas
deśe deśe vipaṇiṣu tathā catvare pānagoṣṭhyām
unmatteva bhramati bhavato vallabhā hanta kīrtiḥ
trilokīyaṃ kṣudrā tad iha katham asyāḥ sthitir iti |
viśālā kiṃ tatra sphurati na kavīndrapratikṛtiḥ
candraṃ nindati candanaṃ na sahate dveṣṭi śriyaṃ śāradīṃ
tvatkīrtes tulanāṃ kalaṅkamalino dhatte kathaṃ candramāḥ |
grāsavyagramanāḥ pated yadi punas tasyāṅkaśāyī mṛgaḥ
āsīd uptaṃ yad etad raṇabhuvi bhavatā vairimātaṅgakumbhān
muktābījaṃ vimuktaṃ trijagati janayāmāsa kīrtidrumaṃ te |
śeṣo mūlaṃ prakāṇḍaṃ himagirir udadhir dugdhapūrālavālaṃ
jyotsnā śākhāpratānaḥ kusumam uḍucayā yasya candraḥ phalaṃ ca
ekā gaṅgā prayāge malayaparisare candanaṃ mauktikālī
kāntākaṇṭhe himāṃśur viyati sarasi śvetam abjaṃ tathāsyāḥ |
evaṃ te yatra kīrtiḥ pariṇamati yutā yatra śatror akīrtyā
sā candrād api candanād api daravyākoṣakundād api
kṣīrābdher api śeṣato’pi phaṇinaś caṇḍīśahāsād api |
na kṣoṇībhaṅgabhīruḥ kalayati ca śiraḥkampanaṃ tan na vidmaḥ
śṛṇvann etasya kīrtīḥ katham uragapatiḥ prītim āviṣkaroti
dāyādaḥ kundabhāsāṃ diśi vidiśi babhau yasya kīrtipratānaḥ
śeṣaḥ pracchannaveśaḥ kalayati na ruciṃ jāhnavīvāriveṇiḥ |
pītaḥ kṣīrāmburāśiḥ prasabham apahṛtaḥ kuñjaro devabhartur
yatkīrtīnāṃ vivartair ajani sa bhagavān ekadanto’py adantaḥ
kauverīṃ kumbhajanmā vrajati yadi tadā durdharā vindhyavṛddhiḥ |
cintāgniḥ krūrakarmā vyathayati hṛdayaṃ tejasām īśvarasya
malinayati vairivadanaṃ svajanaṃ rañjayati dhavalayati dhātrīm |
kīrtiṃ deva śṛṇotu viṃśatiśatī yac cakṣuṣāṃ vartate |
raktābhiḥ surasundarībhir abhito gītāṃ tu karṇadvayī
duḥsthaḥ śroṣyati nāma kiṃ sa hi sahasrākṣo na cakṣuḥśravāḥ
gīyante yadi pannagībhir aniśaṃ tvatkīrtayas tad vayaṃ
tuṣṭā eva paraṃ tu cetasi camatkāro’yam ārohati |
svāminn aṅkamṛgaḥ kiyanti hi dināny etasya vartiṣyate
gīyante svaram aṣṭamaṃ kalayatā jātena vandhyodarān
karṇaṃ cakṣur ajīgaṇat tava pitus tātaḥ pitā te punaḥ
śaktyādhārakumāram apy ajagaṇat taṃ kātaratvena saḥ |
devo’gān mahiṣīti paśyati jagat tv evaṃ vivektuṃ punaḥ
prāgalbhyaṃ prathayanti vas tad api ca prajñādhanāḥ sādhavaḥ
yadi tadguṇaṃ kaṇṭhe mā dhās tathorasi mā kṛthā
navam iti kiyat karṇau dhehi kṣaṇaṃ phalatu śramaḥ
vaktraṃ sākṣāt sarasvaty adhivasati sadā śoṇa evādharas te
vāhinyaḥ pārśvam etāḥ kṣaṇam api bhavato naiva muñcanti rājan
devaḥ kupyatu vā vicintya vinayaṃ prīto’stu vā mādṛśair
saṃkalpānuvidhāyinaḥ surataros tat kena hāryo madaḥ
bhūtā eva timiṅgilaprabhṛtayo ye yādasām agrimās
te vaisāriṇaveśakeśavaśiśor jātā na rātrau punaḥ |
tāḥ kallolaparamparā iva paraṃ dehatvaco darśitāḥ
bhramati girirāṭ pṛṣṭhe garjaty upaśruti sāgaro
jāyante bahavo’tra kacchapakule kiṃ tu kvacit kacchapī
naikāpy ekam asūta sūnum aparaṃ sūtena vā soṣyate |
yaḥ kūrmasya dināni nāma katicid viśrāmadānakṣamaḥ
jambālāvilam ambu kartum aparā sūte varāhī sutān |
yasyā eva śiśoḥ sthitā vipadi bhūḥ sā putriṇī potriṇī
apatyāni prāyo daśa daśa varāhī janayati
kṣamābhāre dhuryaḥ sa punar iha nāsīn na bhavitā |
devair dugdhapayodhirodhasi urā kair nāma manthācala
svīcakre param eka eva bhagavān udvignalokatrayī
chinne brahmaśiro yadi prathayati preteṣu sakhyaṃ yadi
kṣīvaḥ krīḍati mātṛbhir yadi ratiṃ dhatte śmaśāne yadi |
sṛṣṭvā saṃharati prajā yadi tadāpy ādhāya bhaktyā manas
taṃ seve karavāṇi kiṃ trijagatī śūnyā sa eveśvaraḥ
svaṃ cet saṃcarase vṛṣeṇa laghutā kā nāma digdantināṃ
vyālaiḥ kaṅkaṇakuṇḍalāni kuruṣe hānir na hemnām api |
mūrdhanyaṃ tanuṣe jaḍāṃśum ayaśaḥ kiṃ nāma lokatrayī
āhāro garalaṃ tṛtīyam alike cakṣuḥ kapālaṃ kare
vāsaḥ kuñjaracarma bhasmani ratir bhūṣā bhujaṅgādhipaḥ |
janmālakṣyam asākṣikaṃ kulam avijñātā ca jātiḥ
kathaṃ sevyo’smābhir asau piśācapariṣadbhartā hatāḥ smo vayam
bhasmāvyāhatam uttarīyam uragaḥ krīḍā samaṃ mātṛbhiḥ |
yasyaitāny asamañjasāni tam anācāraiḥ piśācair vṛtaṃ
kaḥ sthāṇuḥ phalavāñchayā vada vṛṣād anyo janaḥ sevate
tulyaiveśvarasevā karma na vidmaḥ purākṛtaṃ kīdṛk |
bhṛṅgī yad asthiśeṣo bhṛśataram akṛśaś ca kūṣmāṇḍaḥ
eko giriśaḥ svāmī gaṇatā tulyaiva vallabhatvaṃ ca |
kiṃ kurmaḥ karmagatau śuṣyati bhṛṅgī vināyakaḥ pīnaḥ
dhig daivam avyayaḥ so’pi bhṛṅgī śuṣyatyato bhṛśam
skande mandāvadhānaṃ carati gaṇapatau maulipātaṃ na dhatte
vṛnde vṛndārakāṇāṃ vinayavati bhṛśaṃ nādarān ātanoti |
kiṃ bhūmnā yaś ca devīṃ na namati girijāṃ tasya nirvyājavṛtteḥ
kṣīāsyāpy ekaniṣṭhā jayati bhagavatī bhṛṅgiṇas tasya bhaktiḥ
yaj jīvaty atidurbalena vapuṣā manye sa evotsavaḥ
sūryād ṛte na tad udeti na cāstam eti
rātrāv oṣadhayo jvalanti kalayanty aujjvalyam apy agnayo
jyotsnāś candramasi sphuranti dadhati jyotīṃṣi tejasvitām |
anyac ca krimayo’pi bibhrati maholeśān amuṣyaiva tāḥ
sarvā eva nidhes tviṣāṃ bhagavato dīptipraticchāyikāḥ
asyāmoṣadhayo jvalantu dadhatu jyotīṃṣi kīṭā api
praṣṭavyāḥ khalu yūyam eva yadi ko’py astaṃ gate bhāsvati
asmin naktam ahar vivekavikale kālādhame nīradaiḥ
bhānor na prasarantu nāma kiraṇāḥ kiṃ tvasya tejasvinaḥ
aye karmālaṅghyaṃ kalaya kim apīdaṃ tanubhṛtām
sudhāṃśor jāteyaṃ katham api kalaṅkasya kaṇikā
vidhātur doṣo’yaṃ na ca guṇanidhes tasya kim api |
sa kiṃ nātreḥ putro na kim u haracūḍārcanamaṇir
na vā hanti dhvāntaṃ jagad upari kiṃ vā na vasati
vaktraṃ mudritam ambujanma bhavatā cet kiṃ tataḥ śāśvataṃ
ajani bhagavān asmād vedhāḥ śiraḥsu sudhābhujāṃ
kṛtapadam idaṃ caitad devyāḥ śriyo dhṛtimandiram |
tad iha bhuvanābhogaślāghye saroruhi yac ciraṃ
śaśadhara tava dveṣārambhaḥ sa eṣa jaḍagrahaḥ
cāritrāṇi raver jayanti jagatām agre tamo durgatiṃ
prītāḥ sma punar asya samprati sadācāreṇa śītadyuter
yat tad bandhuṣu paṅkajeṣu kim api prārambhi durnāṭakam
katham apayaśas tādṛg dhātaḥ svahastitam ātmanaḥ
tat tāvad eva śaśinaḥ sphuritaṃ mahīyo
sveṣām amburuhāṃ śriyaḥ sa bhagavān uṣṇo’pi sevyo raviḥ |
śītenāpi kim indunā yad udaye tasyaiva yad bāndhavair
udbuddhaṃ kumudair idaṃ tu śirasā kṛtsnaṃ jagad ghūrṇate
tathāpi jānudadhno’yam iti cetasi mā kṛthāḥ
uccair unmathitasya tena balinā daivena dhikkarmaṇā
lakṣmīm asya nirasyato jalanidher jātaṃ kim etāvatā |
gāmbhīryaṃ kim ayaṃ jahāti kim ayaṃ puṣṇāti nāmbhodharān
maryādāṃ kim ayaṃ bhinatti kim ayaṃ na trāyate patriṇaḥ
pradīptaḥ pratyaṅgaṃ glapayati tataḥ ko’sya śaraṇam
kiyān indus tasminn asati bhavataḥ kaiva gaṇanā
tvam etenaiveha prasabham asi ratnākara iti |
harer āstāṃ cakṣuḥ prasaratu yaśas te diśi diśi
yal lakṣmīr anapāyinī bhagavato māhātmyam asyaiva tat |
etasmin kṣubhite tu vīcivalanair viśvaṃ nipīya sthite
sūryācandramasor apīha na kathā ke’mī taṭāntadrumāḥ
ekenaiva payodhinā jalamucas te pūritāḥ koṭiśo
saṃbhūyāpi vidhātum asya rajasaḥ staimityam apy akṣamāḥ
kiṃ brūmo jaladheḥ śriyaṃ sa hi khalu śrījanmabhūmiḥ svayaṃ
vācyaḥ kiṃ mahimāsya yasya hi kila dvīpaṃ mahīti śrutiḥ |
tyāgaḥ ko’pi sa tasya bibhrati jagad yasyārthino’py ambudāḥ
śakteḥ kaiva kathāpi yasya bhavati kṣobheṇa kalpāntaram
etasmāj jaladher jalasya kaṇikāḥ kāścid gṛhītvā tataḥ
prāpyaikāṃ jalamānuṣīṃ tribhuvane śrīmān abhūd acyutaḥ
na kṣubhyanty eva tāvan niyamitasalilāḥ sarvadaite samudrāḥ |
āho kṣobhaṃ vrajeyuḥ kvacid api samaye daivayogāt tadānīṃ
na kṣoṇī nādrivargo na ca raviśaśinau sarvam ekārṇavaṃ syāt
vyāpyāśāḥ śayitasya vīcivalanair ullikhya khaṃ preṅkhataḥ
sindhor locanagocaraḥ sa mahimā teṣāṃ tanoty adbhutam |
yair nāyaṃ karaśuktikodaragato dṛṣṭo muner añjalau
līnaḥ kutra mahārṇavasya sa punaḥ kallolakolāhalaḥ
ayaṃ vārām eko nilaya iti ratnākara iti
amībhirmā garvaṃ vaha niravalepā hi kṛtinaḥ |
tvāṃ saṃsevya samudra samprati punar dṛṣṭasvabhāgyakṣaya
śiro dhūtvā dhūtvā kim iti jaladher gāyasi yaśaḥ |
namas tebhyo labhyā ya iha guṇabhājo’pi maṇayaḥ
vigarjām unmuñca tyaja taralatām arṇava manāg
dṛśaṃ merau dadyāḥ sa hi maṇimayaprasthamahito
mahāmaunaḥ sthairyād atha bhuvanam eva draḍhayati
upetā ity evaṃ tava jalanidhe tīram adhunā
vigarjābhiḥ kiṃ naḥ śrutipuṭam aho jarjarayasi
kim asi nitarām uktṣubhormiḥ prasīda namo’stu te
pathi pathi śivāḥ santy asmākaṃ śataṃ kamalākarāḥ
grāvāṇo maṇayo harir jalacaro lakṣmīḥ payomānuṣī
muktaughāḥ sikatāḥ pravālalatikāḥ śaivālam ambha sudhā |
tīre kalpamahīruhaḥ kim aparaṃ sarvatra nāmāmbudher
dūrāt karṇarasāyanaṃ nikaṭatas tṛṣṇāpi no śāmyati
upādhvaṃ tat pānthāḥ punar api saro mārgatilakaṃ
nivṛttiḥ kalyāṇī na punar avatāraḥ katham api
yad vīcībhiḥ spṛśasi gaganaṃ yac ca pātālamūlaṃ
ratnair uddīpayasi payasā yat pidhatse dharitrīm |
dhik tat sarvaṃ tava jalanidhe yad vimucyāśrudhārās
kastvaṃ, ko’pi, kuto’si, ratnavasates tīrād ahaṃ nīradher
labdhaṃ kiṃcana, garjitair badhiratā dṛgvyāhatiḥ saikataiḥ |
kṣārodaṃ yad upāsya jīvasi sakhe ślāghyaṃ na tan manyase
dhig udgāmbhīryaṃ dhig amṛtamayatvaṃ ca jaladher
mādyaty abhram u vallabho’pi satataṃ tat kālakūṭaṃ viṣam |
vistāro yadi nedṛśo na yadi tadgāmbhīryam ambhonidher
na syād vā yadi sarvasattvaviṣayas tādṛgdayānugrahaḥ |
antaḥ prajvalatā payāṃsi dahatā jvālāvalīṃ muñcatā
ke na syur vaḍavānalena balinā bhasmāvaśeṣīkṛtāḥ
dhig vārirāśim api yo hi tathāvidhasya
āścaryaṃ vaḍavānalaḥ sa bhagavān āścaryam ambhonidhir
ekasyāśrayaghasmarasya pibatas tṛptir na jātā jalair
anyasyāpi mahātmano na vapuṣi svalpo’pi toyavyayaḥ
jvalati yadi na madhye vāḍavo havyavāhaḥ |
tribhuvanam api kiṃ na plāvayaty amburāśiḥ
vīcīvyāptadigantaraḥ sa hi tathā vārāṃ patiḥ pīyate
pītaḥ so’pi na pūritaṃ ca jaṭharaṃ tasmai namo’gastaye
kiṃ brūmo harim asya viśvam udare kiṃ vā phaṇāṃ bhoginaḥ
śete yatra hariḥ svayaṃ jalanidheḥ so’py ekadeśe sthitaḥ |
ājñām eva muner praṇamya śirasā vindhyācala sthīyatām
atyuccaiḥ padam icchatā punar iyaṃ no laṅghanīyā tvayā |
tasya tvāṃ gilataḥ kapolaphalake kleśo’pi kiṃ jāyate
nidrālur na hariḥ smṛto na gaṇito dagdhavyaviśvaḥ śikhī
tās tā līḍhavihāyasaḥ kim aparaṃ nālocitā vīcayaḥ |
citraṃ naḥ śrutivibhramo nu muninā pītaḥ sa pāthonidhiḥ
āstāṃ cakṣur idaṃ tiro’ñcati kiyac ceto’pi yad vaibhavair
etenaiva virantum arhasi na te gaṇḍūṣapānādhikā
kācit khyātir ataḥparaṃ param asau parjanyanīvīvyayaḥ
gāmbhīryaṃ bhayadāyi te rasavaśān nānātvam apy adbhutaṃ
na sthairyaṃ śirasā dhṛtasya ca mukhaṃ durvāram ekāntataḥ |
śaktis te mahato’calān api bhidāṃ netuṃ payo brūhi me
sodaryās tava kiṃ khalā vimajatā labdhās tvayā yadguṇāḥ
svātantryaṃ tava nīcasarpaṇam atho pātre sthitau neyatā
sneho hanta tavāntaraṃ na labhate pṛcchāmi tat tvām payaḥ
śiṣyaḥ kiṃ nu dūrīśvaras tava sakhe kiṃ vā tvadīyo guruḥ
cāturvarṇyavihāriṇas tava payaḥ sparśo na garhākaraḥ
pātre satyakulīnatā na bhavati tvallāghavād gauravam |
itthaṃ lokavinindite’pi carite tvaṃ mūrtir īśasya cet
abjaṃ tv abjam athābjabhūs tata ito brahmāṇḍamaṇḍād abhūd
viśvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamātmakam idaṃ tvanmūlam itthaṃ payaḥ |
dhik tvāṃ caura iva prayāsi nibhṛtaṃ nirgatya jālāntarair
badhyante vivaśās tvadekagatayas tvām āśritā jantavaḥ
śaityaṃ nāma guṇas tavaiva sahajaḥ svābhāvikī svacchatā
kiṃ brūmaḥ śucitāṃ bhavanti śucayaḥ sparśena yasyāpare |
kiṃ cātaḥ param asti te stutipadaṃ yaj jīvanaṃ dehināṃ
tvaṃ cen nīcapathena gacchasi payaḥ kas tvāṃ niroddhuṃ kṣamaḥ
tad api nibhṛtam ekaṃ vācyam asty eva kambo
ekaḥ ko’pi sa pāñcajanya udabhūd āścaryabhūtaḥ satāṃ
sambhūtāś ca bhavanti ca pratipadaṃ bhūyo bhaviṣyanti ca
prāyaḥ kambunidher na kukṣikuhare saṃkhyātigāḥ kambayaḥ |
eko’py atra sa tādṛśaḥ kim abhavat kaḥ pāñcajanyād ṛte
dagdhaḥ kiṃ vā bhavati na masī veti sandehinībhiḥ
na sa virauti na cāpi palāyate
api vajreṇa saṃgharṣam api padbhyāṃ parābhavam |
sahante guṇalobhena ta eva maṇayo yadi
samutkṣipto’smīti tvam iha paritāpaṃ tyaja maṇe |
na tyājyā janibhūmir ity alam iha bhrātar maṇīnāṃ gaṇair
yair evāyam akāri vāridhir adho gatvāpi ratnākaraḥ |
naiṣām atra guṇagraho na garimakhyātir na vāghakramo
jātās te punar anyataḥ kṣitibhṛtāṃ mūrdhānam adhyāsate
asatkalpās tāvat tribhuvanam ahārhā api guṇāḥ |
sa kiṃ nāsīd abdhau śrutir api kim asya kvacid abhūt
vaṇigadhipate kiṃcid brūmas trapām iha mā kṛthāḥ
katham anibhṛtaṃ keyaṃ rītiḥ pure tava samprati |
marakatamaṇiḥ kāco vāyaṃ bhaved iti saṃśaye
iha paricitā jātyandhānām iyaṃ na tavonnatir
yal labhase tad api te śreyaḥ
jagaccūḍācumbin marakata sa kas te paribhavaḥ |
yad asmābhis tūṣṇīṃ sthitam iha tavālocanapathe
vikretuṃ vā katham upanataḥ kena deśāntare’smin |
kathaya kim idaṃ jātyā khyātaṃ kim asya varāṭakaiḥ
katibhir athavā labhyaṃ caitat prayojanam asya kim |
bata karatale ratnaṃ kṛtvā viṣīdati vāṇijaḥ
sphaṭikaśakalaḥ kiṃ vā neyaṃ śilā kim u saindhavī
kim iti vihitastambho na syād ayaṃ karakopalaḥ |
āghrātaṃ paricumbitaṃ pratimuhur līḍhaṃ ca yac carvitaṃ
kṣiptaṃ vā yadi nīrasatvakupiteneti vyathāṃ mā kṛthāḥ |
he māṇikya tavaitad eva kuśalaṃ śākhāmṛgeṇāmunā
aye muktāratna prasara bahir uddyotaya gṛhān
api kṣoṇīndrāṇāṃ kuru phalavataḥ svān api guṇān |
mahāgambhīro’yaṃ jaladhir iha kas tvāṃ gaṇayati
jāyantāṃ vaṇijo vayaṃ tu kanaka tvatkīrtivaitālikāḥ |
te cāmlānamukhena hanta bhavatā dāhacchidā vedanām
kiṃ kurmahe tad api hemanidhe bhavantaṃ
datte na vīkṣitum apīha sa dagdhayakṣaḥ
adayaṃ gharṣa śilāyāṃ daha vā dāhena bhindhi lauhena |
he hemakāra kanakaṃ ma māṃ guñjāphalais tulaya
vyāpāre’py avikāri yac ca śikhini kṣiptaṃ ca na mlāyasi |
etasyām api śuddhisampadi tulām āropya yat sādhubhir
guñjābhiḥ samakakṣām ity avadhṛtaṃ hā svarṇa kiṃ ceṣṭyatām
kallolāḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgurāś ca sahasā nītāḥ parām unnatim |
antaḥ prastarasaṃgraho bahir api bhraśyanti gandhadrumā
bhrātaḥ śoṇa na so’sti yo na hasati tvatsaṃpadāṃ viplave
prāyaścittam upācaranti kṛtinaḥ spṛṣṭvaiva yāsāṃ payaḥ |
yā dṛṣṭaiva punāti viśvam akhilaṃ seyam apunar jāhnavī
vicchinnā kvacid āvilā kvacid atisvalpāmbuśocyā kvacit
vinīto’yaṃ veśaḥ śamam iva nadīnāṃ kathayati |
tathāpy āsāṃ tais tais tarubhir abhitas tīrapatitaiḥ
sa evāgre buddhau pariṇamati ruddho’py avinayaḥ
kiṃ tv āvilaṃ janitam ambu navodakena
kati na kati taḍāgāḥ santi kiṃtv asya haṃsa
pravara vahati kas te mānasasya pratiṣṭhām
kā vā tasya kathārghitasya saraso yat tīrajanmāpy asau
dūrād eva dṛśoḥ śramaṃ harati naḥ snigdhāvalokas taruḥ
saras tīkṣṇaṃ mā bhūs tava kila nisargaḥ śiśirimā |
nirasyantaḥ pānthāṃs tvayi kim api śoṣaṃ vidadhati
salīlaṃ haṃsānāṃ pibati nivaho yatra vimalaṃ
jalaṃ mohāt tasmin sarasi rucire cātakayuvā |
svabhāvād garvād vā na pibati payas tasya śakunaiḥ
kim etenoccais tvaṃ bhavati laghimā vāpi sarasaḥ
pītaṃ yat prabhavoruvīcivalanair vyāptaṃ samastaṃ jagat |
unnidraiḥ kamalaiḥ payobhir amalair nītvā parāṃ nirvṛtim |
paścāt kṣīṇadhanāṃ vahan nijatanuṃ dhanyo mṛṇālīcchalād
gate śoṣaṃ daivād varasarasi tatraiva taralā
punar api seyam adhasta eva mūrdhni
śoṣaṃ dūram upāgatena pathika kleśān muhur mūrcchatā |
majjaddanti patatpatatri sukṛtair etan mayāptaṃ saraḥ
yat kūpeṣv api dūranihnutapayoleśeṣu nītaṃ mano
yat khāteṣv api paṅkadurgasalilastokeṣu dṛṣṭiḥ kṛtā |
tvām āsādya taḍāga samprati sa me śānto nidāghajvaraḥ
bhekaiḥ koṭaraśāyibhir mṛtam iva kṣmāntargataṃ kacchapaiḥ
tasminn eva sarasy akālajaladenāgatya tac ceṣṭitaṃ

chittapasya | (Bp 201, Sv 843, dakṣiṇātyasya; śā.pa. 777, akālajaladasya;
                            su.ra. 1059, dvandūkasya)
pāṭhīna muñca kundadaṃ yad ihāmbu pītvā
kva śakulaśiśo gambhīrāmbhaḥ saras tava janmabhūḥ
kuveṇībaddhaḥ sann anubhava daśām utphalasi kim
dṛṣṭvā gatau kuṭilatāṃ vadane viṣaṃ ca |
alam abhimukhair baddhair bhogair alaṃ bhramibhir
dṛśor alam aviralair garjodgārair alaṃ viṣavṛṣṭibhiḥ |
kim iha bhujagāḥ kopāvegair amībhir amudritair
kṣudrās te bhujagāḥ śirāṃsi namayaty ādāya yeṣām idaṃ
jīrṇas tv eṣa phaṇī na yasya kim api tvādṛgguṇīndravrajā
api nadatha nikāmaṃ dardurāḥ kiṃ suvarṇa
sa ciram avaṭasīmni prācya eva krayo vaḥ
iyat pṛthvīmātraṃ tad anu ca nabhomaṇḍalam iyad
iyān pātālānto jalam api pṛthivyām iyad iti |
iti jñātvā kūpe viditaviṣayo nāyam aparaḥ
śrutvā kumbhabhuvo muner iha durācāraṃ kam apy adbhutaṃ
sindhor andhukuṭumbi dardurakulaṃ harṣād idaṃ dhyāyati |
gāmbhīryād yadi te na bibhyati na vā trasyanti bhekīśiśor
atrāgatya sukhaṃ vasantu timayo jātānukampā vayam
yac cādhomukham akṣiṇī vidadhatā nāgena tūṣṇīṃ sthitaṃ
tan manye viṣamantriṇo bhagavataḥ kasyāpi līlāyitam
āmūlaṃ guṇasaṃgrahāt tu nalina tvacceṣṭitaṃ kiṃ stumaḥ |
yac chuṣke sarasi prayāsi vidaśāṃ saṃvāsamaryādayā
dhik kurmo’sya madhuvratasya caritaṃ doṣātanīṃ durdaśāṃ
dṛṣṭvā yas tava padmaṣaṇḍakumudair dhatte rahas tāṇḍavam |
ślāghyas taṃ punar eka eva yad iha prātaḥ samabhyāgate
tāny evollasitāni saiva sakhitā tac caiva koṣārpaṇam
kāntis te yadi nirmalā yadi guṇā lakṣmīr yadi sthāyinī
mā gāḥ padma madaṃ tathāpi galitā hy ete śaradvāsarāḥ |
madhye’traiva varāṭakena bhavataḥ stheyaṃ punaḥ kevalam
punar api gato raktāśokaṃ kadambataruṃ tataḥ |
tad api suciraṃ sthitvā kunde prayāti saroruhaṃ
yenāmodini kesarasya mukule pītaṃ madhu svecchayā
nītā yena niśā śaśāṅkadhavalā padmodare śāradī |
so’yaṃ bhṛṅgayuvā karīraviṭape badhnāti dṛṣṭiṃ kutaḥ
aśoke śokārtaḥ kim asi bakule’py ākulamanā
nirānandaḥ kunde saha ca sahakārair na ramase |
kusumbhe viśrambhaṃ yad iha bhajase kaṇṭakaśatair
te’mī vayaṃ madhuliho bhagavān sa yebhyaḥ
vegād dhāvati mañju guñjati paraṃ tat ko’yam indindaraḥ
sakhe bata khalu śivā saṃtuṣṭasya dvirepha tava sthitiḥ
rasāle sālambo lavam api lavaṅge na ramate |
priyaṅgau nāsaṅgaṃ racayati na cūte vicarati
prāṇās te yadi vallabhās tad api kiṃ niṣpaṅkajā medinī |
dūrīkṛtya tu paṅkajaṃ madhupa he tasyaiva yad gaṇḍayor
dānāmbhau nirato’si tad vayam aho vaktuṃ ca lajjāmahe
prasūnair unnidraiḥ saha bahubhir eva prativanam |
udanyā na kvāpi vyaramad aravinde param amī
iha parimalo yatra vyakto na tatra madhuśriyo
madhu samadhikaṃ yasmiṃs tasmin na gandhasamṛddhayaḥ |
kamalam adhikaṃ smāraṃ smāraṃ viṣīdati ṣaṭpadaḥ
dhanyas tvaṃ sahakāra samprati phalaiḥ kākān śukān pūrayan
pūrvaṃ tu tvayi muktamañjaribharonnidre ya indindaraḥ |
ākrīḍann aniśaṃ sa naiti phalitaṃ yat tvāṃ vikaśaikabhuk
taddharmo’sya phalāśayā paricayaḥ kalpadrume’py asti kim
śraddhālur na kathaṃ prayātu sahasā mākandam indindaraḥ
tādṛk parimalaṃ vetti yadi dhanyo madhuvrataḥ
parolakṣā vṛkṣāḥ param iha rasāleṣu rasikaḥ
cumban nūtanaketakīṃ pratimuhur yat kaṇṭakaiḥ kīlitaḥ |
re re cañcalacañcarīka tad idaṃ karmānurūpaṃ phalam
asyaiva te phalam aho anayasya bhūtaṃ
kiṃ re bhṛṅga mudhaiva dhāvasi madhupratyāśayā ketakīḥ |
ketakyāḥ kusumasya sādhu sakalaṃ doṣas tv ayaṃ kevalaṃ
biddhā na praviśanti yan madhuliho dvāri sthitaiḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ
karīndraṃ paulomīpatir api ca lebhe jalanidheḥ |
tvayā kiṃ tallabdhaṃ kathaya mathito mandaragire
śaraṇyaḥ śailānāṃ yad ayam adayaṃ ratnanilayaḥ
dṛṣṭā na dviradāvalī na camarīpucchānilaḥ sevito
nītāḥ kṣauṇibhṛto na pādapadavīṃ dhig daivam ambhonidhau
magnasyaiva girīndraputra bhavato maināka yātaṃ vayaḥ
ekasyāyam udeti mūrdhani girer anyasya caiva kramād
astaṃ yāti kalānidhis tad anayor astaḥ praśasto’calaḥ |
ko nāmodayinaṃ karoti na śiromāṇikyam astaṃ punar
yātaṃ yaḥ kurute bhavān iva sa duṣprāpo’yam uccaiḥ śirāḥ
sūraṃ mūrdhni dadhātu pūrvaśikharī naivātra citrodayaḥ |
prāptās taṃ divase gatāyuṣi parikṣīṇāṃśum etaṃ punaḥ
kurvan mauligataṃ karoti caramaś citraṃ dharitrīdharaḥ
yatra sthitā hi taravas taravas ta eva |
mātaṅgāc chataśaḥ puṣāṇa śataśo vyālīsutān saṃvṛṇu
tvatkīrtis tu na candanakṣitiruhād anyaḥ samālokyate
bhrātaś candanaśaila muñca jaḍatāṃ vistārayan saurabhaṃ
gacchann eva vilāsibhir marud ayaṃ nirvājam āliṅgyatām |
itas tāvan netre valaya malayādre nidhir apām
athātmānaṃ kiṃ na smarasi kulaśailaṃ kim ayaśaḥ
tvadvāsāya sa eva kīrtikanakajyotsno girīṇāṃ patiḥ
smero’yaṃ śarabhaḥ parāṃ hṛdi ghṛṇām āyāti jātasmayaḥ
īśānāṃ sarabhaḥ kathaṃ sa hi bhaved arvāg girāṃ gocaraḥ
hate vā nīte vā bata laghutarāṃ śocyapadavīṃ
mṛgendraṃ vā mṛgāriṃ vā hariṃ vyāharatāṃ janaḥ |
kiṃ jātair bahubhiḥ karoti hariṇī putrair akāryakṣamaiḥ
putreṇāpi vanāntare vicalatā yaiḥ sārdham uttrasyati |
tattejaś ca tad ūrjitaṃ sa ca nagonmāthī ninādo mahān |
sarvaṃ viśvajayaikasādhanam idaṃ labdhaṃ na kiṃcit kṛtam
itthaṃ na kiṃcid api cāru mṛgādhipasya
tejas tu tat kim api yena jagadvarākam
prakṛtyā garjanti tvayi tu bhuvanaṃ nirmadamadaḥ |
prasīda prārambhād virama vinayethāḥ krudham imāṃ
hare jīmūtānāṃ dhvair iyam udīrṇo na kariṇām
sphītaṃ na varṣma nakharair draḍhimā na labdhaḥ |
nādas tathāpi mṛdur eva sa ko’pi siṃha
cakṣuḥ kopāt kuṭilam arūṇaṃ bibhrataḥ siṃhaśāvā
haṃho siṃhakiśoraka tyajasi cet kopaṃ vadāmas tadā
hatvaivaṃ kariṇāṃ sahasram akhilaṃ kiṃ labdham āyuṣmatā |
itthaṃ kartum ahaṃ samartha iti ced dhiṅ mūrkha kiṃ sarvato
nālaṃ plāvayituṃ jagajjalanidhir yad dhairyam ālambate
tad bhoḥ krīḍata kuñjarādhipatayaḥ svacchandam antar mṛgāḥ
kampaṃ muñcata keśarī vidhivaśāt prāpto jarādurduśām
nabhasi caratām abhodānāṃ niśamya ravaṃ manāg
kṣitiruham aṭat kārān pārśve śṛṇoti sa keśarī
pratyekaṃ sa hi mūrcchayā nipatito gandhadvipānāṃ gaṇaḥ |
prārambhābhyadhikakriyasya sa khalu prācyaḥ pracāro hareḥ |
aṅgair aṅgabhṛto dalanti darato gandhena gandhadvipāḥ
tadā jānīmas te karivara madodgāram asamaṃ
tāpo nāpagatas tṛṣā na ca kṛśā dhautā na dhūlī tanor
na svacchandam akāri kandakavalaḥ kā nāma kelīkathā |
dūronmuktakareṇa hanta kariṇā spṛṣṭā na vā padminī
kolavyūhaḥ spṛśati sukhitāṃ yatra tatrāpi kuñje |
ko nāmāsmin bata hatavane pādapas tādṛg uccair
kandair yasya sadāśitaṃ bhavavidhiḥ krīḍākariṇyaḥ śatam |
talpaṃ śaivalinīdalāni milito daivān marūṇāṃ taṭe
jihmas tāmyati saṃsmarann anudinaṃ vindhyaṃ sa gandhadvipaḥ
jighṛkṣur vā muktāṃ daśanam athavā hanti kariṇaṃ
purāṇaḥ pratyagraṃ phalam iha hi vikrīya katicit
sa nāgendro jīvan kati kati na lakṣāṇi labhate
na dṛṣṭas tvaṃ daivād apasara sudūraṃ drutam itaḥ |
svacchandaṃ gamitaḥ sukhena katibhiḥ kālo na dantāvalaiḥ |
dhig jāto’si tadātra dagdhasamaye dantin yadā nodakaṃ
no vṛkṣā na tṛṇāni kevalam ayaṃ dāvānalaḥ krīḍati
he nāgendra pulindapattanam itaḥ pārśve sudūre girir
valmīkasya na kasyacit tava padāropān na rūpāntaram |
gale pāśas tīvraś caraṇayugayugme ca nigaḍo
na jānīmo mūḍha dviradavara kasmāt tava madaḥ
vimuñca svācchandyād apanayatu tāvat tṛṣam imām
taṃ dānāvasare tu mattamadhupa vyālolagaṇḍaṃ gajaṃ
sānandaṃ sabhayaṃ ca paśyati muhur dvāre sthitas tāpasaḥ
kṣīyante yadi koṭayo’py apacayaḥ kiṃ tena bhūmībhujām |
grāmyām agre kareṇuṃ svayam upanayatā yena baddho’si pāśair
yena kṣuṇṇaṃ śiras te sṛṇibhir amasṛṇair yena bāhyaḥ kṛto’si |
jantūn abhyeṣi hantuṃ tvam asi gajapate satyam eko madāndhaḥ
kṣutkṣāmo vikalaḥ karī kṣitibhṛtaḥ pādāntike prasthitaḥ |
nirmagnaḥ kim ayaṃ karoti bhagavān yasya pratīpo vidhiḥ
śītāṃśoḥ śriyam āvahanti gamanād bhraśyanti yasyācalāḥ |
jānīmaḥ kim akāṇḍacaṇḍimaguṇān daivasya yena kṣaṇān
katham api patitas tvaṃ dustare paṅkarāśau
krudhā dhāvan magno hradapayasi kaṣṭaṃ karipatiḥ
na paśyaty evāśāḥ śrayati na viṣādaṃ na manasā
saumddhāre śaktaṃ bhuvi kam api nānyaṃ gaṇayati |
re revātaṭakelilampaṭavapḥ śokaṃ vṛthā mā kṛthāḥ
kumbhin kumbhasamāhṛtaṃ piba payo bandhyaiva vindhyasmṛtiḥ |
ghāsagrāsaṃ gṛhāṇa tyaja gajakalabha premabandhaṃ kariṇyāṃ
tyakto vindhyagiriḥ pitā bhagavatī māteva revānadī
tvallobhān nanu hastini svayam idaṃ bandhāya dattaṃ vapus
tvaṃ dūre dhriyase luṭhanti ca śiraḥpīṭhe kaṭhorāṅkuśāḥ
cintāṃ ye janayanti cetasi paraṃ smṛtvā svayūthaṃ vane
ayi kṣudro mābhūn matimahimagarvo manasi vaḥ
karī yāto bandhaṃ yad iha vinayas tatra vijayī |
ayaṃ krodhādhmātas tyajati vinayaṃ cen madavaśāt
tataḥ skandhāvāraṃ na kim akhilam evākulayati
śānte’pi svayam eva dāvaśikhini krūraṃ kirātādhipe
cāpaṃ saṅkalayaty api ślathayati vyādhe ca tāṃ vāgurām |
nirdagdhaṃ vapur āhatāni parito marmāṇi rugṇā gatiḥ
nādatse haritāṅkurān kvacid api sthairyaṃ na yad gāhase
yat paryākulalocano’si karuṇaṃ kūjan diśaḥ paśyasi |
vanyaiḥ prāṇini kānaneṣu hariṇas tadgātravairī nijaḥ
krūro’raṇyapatis tad atra śaraṇaṃ śānto’sty adūre muniḥ |
ity asminn upasedivān ayam asāv asyaiva durdaivato
mā bhaiṣīr iti bhāṣaṇe’py akaruṇo jāto’tha vācaṃyamaḥ
nāsanne’pi dadāti śaṣpavipine kṣāme dṛśau na kṣipaty
na svastho bata kautukād api suhṛdgoṣṭhīṣu tiṣṭhāsati
krūravyādhakuleṣu hanta piśitaiḥ svair iva vairī mṛgaḥ
tyaktaṃ janmavanaṃ tṛṇāṅkaravatī māteva muktā sthalī
mṛgyantaḥ padavīṃ tathāpy akaruṇā vyādhā na muñcanti mām
chittvā pāśam apāsya kūṭaracanāṃ bhittvā balād vāgurāṃ
kūpāntaḥpatitaḥ karotu viguṇe kiṃ vā vidhau pauruṣam
mṛtgaḥ paścād ālokayati ca muhur yāti ca muhuḥ
bhuvo vanyā magnāḥ śiśur ayam adṛṣṭavyatikaraḥ
muhuḥ paśyan majjaty akaruṇa tathāpi praharasi
yady etad vipinaṃ vipannam ahaha kṣuṇṇaṃ kim etat saras
tac cet kiṃ punar agrato nanu dhanur dhvānaḥ paṭīyān ayam |
vegād dūravinirgato’pi sapadi vyāvṛtya dhāvan mṛgo
gacchantīṃ smṛtiśeṣatām upagataḥ snehasya kiṃ duṣkaram
ito vyādho dhāvaty ayam anupadaṃ cakritadhanuḥ |
ito’py agre tiṣṭhaty ayam ajagaro vistṛtamukhaḥ
kva yāyāt kiṃ kuryān mṛgaśiśur ayaṃ daivavaśagaḥ
vyomārdhe jvalito raviḥ kavalitaṃ dāvānalaiḥ kānanaṃ
dhūmyābhir na diśaḥ sphuranti paritaḥ panthāḥ śilādanturaḥ |
itthaṃ śoṇitasiktasṛkkaṇi yathā prāṇaṃ mṛge dhāvati
māṃ muñca vāgurika yāmi kuru prasādam |
etan na tāṇḍavaya sairibha kānanaṃ ca |
nāmībhiḥ prasavaiḥ svayaṃ nipatitair bhūmau vidhatte dhṛtiṃ
janma svodarapūraṇaṃ ca vighasair na sparśayogyaṃ vapuḥ |
tan mṛṣṭaṃ sakalaṃ tvayādya śunaka kṣoṇīpater ājñayā
ślāghyā yasya gayāśiraḥ sahacarī tulyo’śvamedhena yaḥ |
ucchrāyo janabhīti hetur adhikaṃ vaikṛtyam udgrīvatā
yasyoccaiḥ kaṭukaṇṭakapraṇayitā dhik kaṣṭam uṣṭre paśau
śākhānām upari sthitaiḥ śakunibhir dūrād gṛhītā diśaḥ
sadyomuktaphalair vivṛtya kapibhiḥ paśyadbhir eva sthitam |
chāyāpās tapariśramaiś ca pathikair ātmā paraṃ rakṣito
mūrdhāropaṇasatkṛtair diśi diśi kṣudrair vihaṅgair drutaṃ
hā kaṣṭaṃ phalalolupair apasṛtaṃ śākhāmṛgaiś cañcalair
tvām ālokya subhūruhaṃ khalu vayaṃ mārgaṃ vihāyāgatāḥ |
vyākurmahe bahu kim asya taroḥ sadaiva
nāmany anta tadātanīm api nijacchāyākṣitiṃ taiḥ punas
teṣām eva tale kṛtajñacaritaiḥ śuṣyadbhir apy āsyate
yasmāt tvayā na vihito viduṣāṃ niḥśeṣas
tasmin kalpatarau stabdhe labdhenāpi phalena kim
patrāṇi prathamaṃ drutāni vikulair utkhātamūlaḥ kramāt
kīṭaiḥ kalpamahīruhaḥ sa patito bhagnāḥ śataṃ vallayaḥ |
pūrvāśādhipatiḥ prasīdati sa ced devo dayāvān hariḥ
ślāghyas tatra sa eva kalpaviṭapī yatrāsate’mī guṇāḥ |
saṃkalpāḥ phaladohadāni phalitaṃ ratnāni vṛttir jagat
saṃkalpānuvidhāyi yasya phalitaṃ kas tasya dhatte tulāṃ
dhig jātiṃ drumasaṃkathāsu yad asau kalpadrumāpi drumaḥ
śramacchittyai chāyāṃ bhaja pathika he candanataror
iha vyālavrātaḥ punar iti bhayaṃ mā khalu kṛthāḥ |
svanair yeṣāṃ ramyair api hi phaṇinaḥ kvāpy apasṛtāḥ
āmodais te diśi diśi gatair dūram ākṛṣyamāṇāḥ
sākṣāl lakṣmīṃ tava malayaja draṣṭum abhyāgatāḥ smaḥ |
kiṃ paśyāmaḥ subhaga bhavataḥ krīḍati kroḍa eva
vyālas tubhyaṃ bhavatu kuśalaṃ muñca naḥ sādhayāmaḥ
kṣiptaś cen malayācalendra bhavataḥ pādopajīvī nijas
tan niryātu jahātu pannagakulaṃ tāpaṃ nihantu śriyaṃ
dhattāṃ vindatu vandyatāṃ trijagatāṃ tvatkīrtim unmudrayan
kakubhi kakubhi bhrāmaṃ bhrāmaṃ vilokya vilokitaṃ
adhikam adhikaṃ yat saurabhyaṃ tanoti manoharam
kva malayataṭī janmasthānaṃ kva te ca vanecarāḥ
kva ca kharaśilāpaṭṭe ghṛṣṭiḥ kva paṅkasarūpatā
malayaja sakhe mā gāḥ khedaṃ guṇās tava vairiṇaḥ
chāyām asya niṣevya pippalataror ākṛṣya śākhāḥ śataṃ
bhuktaṃ prāg iti lajjayā gajapate kiṃ nātra viśramyate |
daivenedṛśayoga eva ghaṭito yat tvādṛśāṃ koṭibhis
tādṛk tādṛg ayaṃ kṛtaḥ punar abhūd etādṛśaḥ pallavaiḥ
sanmārgo’yam alaṅkṛtaḥ kim aparaṃ tvaṃ mūrtibhedo hareḥ |
aśvatthasya gataḥ sukhena jagatāṃ vandyasya janmagrahaḥ
sākṣān naiṣa karoti kām api mudaṃ nādṛtya hanty āpado
na prīṇāti manīṣiṇāṃ śravaṇam apy āśvāsanāsūktibhiḥ |
śākhā vanyamataṅgajair na karabhair āsvādya muktā tvacaḥ |
sthāṇuḥ kevalam asti pippalataros tatrāpi śītāturair
tais tair janmaprabhṛti viditair dohadaiḥ prākprayatnāt
siktvā siktvā katham api ghaṭīyantramuktaiḥ payobhiḥ |
tatra snehaṃ tyajasi kim ivodyānapāla kṣaṇena
ekaḥ klāntajanāśrayo vijayase cūta tvam urvīruhāṃ
dhig daivaṃ bhavato’pi kīṭapaṭalair antaḥ praveśaḥ kṛtaḥ
he cūtadruma kiṃ mudhaiva madhupān prīṇāsi kiṃ kokilān
tān ullāsaya pallavān anudinaṃ yair āhitām unnatiṃ
snigdhaṃ pallavito ghanaṃ mukulitaḥ sphāracchadaṃ puṣpitaḥ
sotkarṣaṃ phalito bhṛśaṃ ca vinataḥ ko’py eṣa cūtadrumaḥ
sugandhiḥ ko’pi syāt kusumasamaye ko’pi viṭapī
sthitvā phalāni sadṛśāni vidhehi mā vā
dṛṣṭvaiva te mukham aśoka vayaṃ viśokāḥ
saṃbādhāś ca śataṃ vasantasamaye vaiśeṣikāḥ śākhinaḥ |
kaṅkelliḥ śriyam asya puṣyati tathā kaḥ prekṣaṇīyoparaḥ
kiyantaḥ santy ete jagati taravaḥ ko’pi na punaḥ
pramodād antaś ced valati phalavāñchā tava tadā
keṣāṃcit kusumodayād anu vinā tenāpi keṣāṃcana
sphāyante dharaṇīruhām iha dinair dvitraiḥ phalaśreṇayaḥ |
śrīr ity eva phalād ṛte bata gataḥ kaṅkellijanmagrahaḥ
kiṃ te namratayā kim unnatatayā kiṃ te ghanacchāyayā
kiṃ te pallavalīlayā kim anayā cāśoka puṣpaśriyā |
na svādūni mṛdūni khādati phalāny ākaṇṭham utkaṇṭhitaḥ
nāmodaḥ kusume phaleṣu na rasas tat kiṃ mudhā śālmale
kāṇḍaṃ nirbharam āvṛṇoṣi viṣamair āmūlataḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ
nirgandhaṃ kusumaṃ phalaṃ kṣudhi mudhā patrair na hṛdyaṃ kvacit |
vṛddhir gṛdhraparigrahāya tad aho vaktavyam anyat paraṃ
bhrātaḥ śālmalivṛkṣa nāsti bhavataḥ kiṃcin mahattvocitam
kiṃ re jālma javena śālmaliphalapratyāśayā dhāvasi |
adhvāno’pi nimīlitākṣam aṭatā na prekṣaṇīyāḥ puraḥ
prakāṇḍaśrīr vācām api na viṣayaḥ śālmalitaros
etasmin kusume svabhāvamahati prāyo mahīyaḥ phalaṃ
ramyaṃ svādu sugandhi śītalam alaṃ prāptavyam ity āśayā |
yac chāyām atanuṃ tanoṣi madhuraiḥ prīṇāsi yat tvaṃ phalair
yan namno’si yad unnato’si cature yad vartase vartmani |
yat pānthair aparair api pratipathaṃ prastūyase prāyaśas
tan nātha kṣitija tvam eva pathikair viśrāntaye cintyase
vahati pavanaḥ pāṃśūtkarṣī kṛśaḥ saraso rasaḥ |
ahaha na jahaty ete prāṇāṃs tadaiva kim adhvagā
yadi na bhavataḥ patracchatraṃ viśanti mahīruhaḥ
āsīd yas tava putrakas tricaturaiḥ patrāṅkurair āvṛto
so’yaṃ saṃprati vāsaraiḥ katipayair adhvany apuṇyoccayaiḥ
viśrāmadrumaṃ kathyatāṃ tava vipatkāle kva te sāmpratam |
yāsāṃ chedanam antareṇa patito nāyaṃ kuṭhāras tvayi
kiṃ jāto’si catuṣpathe yadi ghanacchāyo’si kiṃ chāyayā
yuktaś cet phalito’si kiṃ phalabharair āḍhyo’si kasmān nataḥ |
he sad vṛkṣa sahasva samprati śikhāśākhyāśatākarṣaṇa
itīdaṃ jānīmaś ciram apathabhājas tava taro
tathāpy asyām akṣmāruhi bhuvi bhavān eva śaraṇam
yad api kiṃ kvacid uñctam āśu tat
āśyānair galitaṃ dalair bata kathāśeṣāḥ prasūnaśriyo
nodbhedo’pi phalaṃ prati pratidiśaṃ yātā nirāśāḥ khagāḥ |
tūṣṇīm asti tathāpy akālajaladaṃ dhyāyan marukṣmāruhaḥ
nāsāgre pavanaḥ paraṃ nayanayor āpaḥ kryā cetasi
sthairyaṃ dāhabhareṣu kiṃ nu viditā naitā marukṣoṇayaḥ |
kalyāṇaṃ naḥ kim adhikam ito jīvanārthaṃ yad asmāl
kiṃ tv etasminn aśanipiśunair ātapair ākulānām
nyagrodhe phalaśālini sphuṭarasaṃ kiṃcit phalaṃ pacyate
bījāny aṅkuragocarāṇi katicit sidhyanti tasminn api |
ekas teṣv api kaścid aṅkuravaro badhnāti tām unnatiṃ
yām adhyan yajanaḥ svamātaram iva klānticchide dhāvati
spṛśākāśaṃ sarvāḥ sthagaya pariṇāhair api diśaḥ |
tathāpi dhvāṅkṣebhyo na punar itaraḥ ko’pi vihagaḥ
phalārthī nimba tvāṃ prakṛtivirasaṃ dhāvati mudā
kṣudhottaptaiḥ kukṣiṃbharibhir iha sevā tava kṛtāḥ |
na dṛṣṭā te’smābhiḥ panasa pariṇāme virasatā
yadīyaḥ sarveṣām iha khalu vikāro’py abhimataḥ |
na samprāpto vṛddhiṃ sapadi hatadaivāt samucitāṃ
kim ikṣor doṣo’yaṃ sa punar aguṇāyā marubhuvaḥ
śamīṣaṇḍas tāvat khadiravanam asmāc ca paratas
itaḥ karkandhūnāṃ vanam anu yavāsasthalam idaṃ
kva kalyāṇaḥ panthāḥ pathika hatadeśo marur ayam
he dhārādhara viśvam eva bhavatā sādhāraṇaṃ siñcatā
vāstavyo bhava mā punar marupathaprasthānavāñchāṃ kṛthāḥ |
labhyante puruṣaiḥ paraṃ katipayaiḥ kaupāḥ payobindavaḥ
nanv ete marumedinīparisarā yair asti gopāyitaṃ
krūrair na svaparopakāri sakalaṃ p¸atālamūle payaḥ
pāyaṃ pāyaṃ piba piba payaḥ siñca siñcāṅgam aṅgaṃ
bhūyo bhūyaḥ kuru kuru sakhe majjanonmajjanāni |
sindhur dūrībhavati purato māravaḥ pāntha panthāḥ
caṇḍānilavyatikare kva bhavān kva te vā
tyajaitāṃ sīmānaṃ vasati munir asyāṃ kalaśabhūḥ |
udañcatkope’smin sa jaladhir api sthāsyati na te
yataḥ pāyaṃ pāyaṃ salilam iha śauryaṃ prathayasi
ākalpaṃ yadi varṣasi pratidinaṃ dhārāsahasrais tathāpy
ambhodhau kalayaty agādhajaṭhare kas tāvakīnaṃ śramam |
ambhoda kṣaṇamātram ujjhasi payaḥ pṛṣṭhe yadi kṣmābhṛtāṃ
tat kiṃ na prasaranti nirjharasaridvyājena te kīrtayaḥ
krīḍābhir na payoda gantum ucitaṃ velābhiṣiktadrumān
kim ebhir nirghoṣaiḥ sṛja jhaṭiti jhātkāri salilam
guṇaṃ vā doṣaṃ vā gaṇayati na dānavyasanitā
sa cen mūrcchanmatsyāvalir api nipītaḥ patir apāṃ
tato vāntaḥ kiṃ tadvyavasitam agastyena tapasā |
ghanaḥ ślāghyaḥ pītvā kiyad api payas tasya hi vaman
bibharty etad viśvaṃ tam api kila ratnākarayati
dhig dhik tān udadhīs tumanstu jaladaṃ yebhyaḥ samabhyarthitaiḥ
pāthobhiḥ padavīṃ nidāghavikalāṃ yaḥ plāvayan varṣati |
yady asyāpy udare bhaved agaṇitas tāvan maṇīnāṃ gaṇas
tat kiṃ naiṣa karoti ratnakarakāsāraiḥ samṛddhaṃ jagat
marīcir yady eṣā vahasi kim u khadyotanivahān |
kim ete kartāraḥ kumudavanam unnidram udadheḥ
kim ānandaṃ mandīkṛtatimiravṛndāḥ kim u diśaḥ
koṭiṃ kām api sāmprataṃ malinimā nītas tvayā yan nijaḥ |
yat sambhūya bakair amībhir ahaha tvaṃ bhūṣaṇotprokṣaṇād
sarvāṃs trāsaya garjitaiḥ kalagiro haṃsān samutsāraya |
drāg āskandaya mitramaṇḍalam alaṃ sadvartma saṃdūṣaya
śrīmann abda nayaty ayaṃ na pavano yāvad daśāṃ kām api
taḍittejaḥpuñjair janayasi dṛśoḥ kām api rujaṃ
tad asyaivāmbhodher jaladhara na dhairyaṃ kalayasi
ambho na cej jalada muñcasi mā vimuñca
vajraṃ punaḥ kṣipasi nirdaya kasya hetoḥ
ghanair muktā dhārāḥ sapadi payasas tān prati muhuḥ |
khagānāṃ ke meghāḥ ka iha vihagā vā jalamucām
dhvanir api madhuras te na śrutaś cātakena
abdhir yady avadhīrito na tu tadā tasmān nipīyāmbudair
tat te nistrapanīcataiva mucitā nirvaktum etat kathaṃ
vidmaḥ kena guṇena māniṣu punaḥ sāraṅga saṃgīyate
tṛṣṇārtaḥ kila rauti yāvad asakṛt toyāśayā cātakaḥ |
ayi cātaka cañcupuṭāt skhalayati jaladodabindum anilaś cet |
dvija eva bhāgyahīno jīvanadātā kṛtī jaladaḥ
sindhor eva kiyaj jalaṃ kalasabhūr yatpāṇipātre dadhau
tat pītaṃ kiyad ambudaiḥ kiyad ito vāntaṃ kiyad vā sthitam |
tat pātuṃ vyavasāyadīnamanaso dhāvanty amī sambhramād
āvartair marutāṃ tad apy apahṛtaṃ dhik cātakān dhig vidhim
bījair aṅkuritaṃ latābhir uditaṃ vallībhir ujjṛmbhitaṃ
kandaiḥ kandalitaṃ janaiś ca muditaṃ dhārādhare varṣati |
bhrātaś cātaka pātakaṃ kim api te samyaṅ na jānīmahe
yenāsmin na patanti cañcupuṭake dvitrāḥ payobindavaḥ
ayi cātaka cañcupuṭāt skhalayati jaladodabindum anilaś cet |
dvija eva bhāgyahīno jīvanadātā kṛtī jaladaḥ
viṣvakplāvayatā jaganti jalada prītas tvayā vāribhiḥ
sānandāḥ stumahe cirāya caritaṃ tasyaiva yena tvayi
kṣīṇo’pi kvacid eva nāmbhasi manāg āro’pi cañcū puṭaḥ
kvacid api yadi dṛṣṭaṃ vārivāhaṃ vihāya |
tvaṃ garja nāma visṛjāmbuda nāmbu nāma
etasya paśya vihagasya gatis tvam eva
tyaktvā toyada cātakena bhavataḥ sevā samālambitā |
gāḍhaṃ garjasi vajram ujjhasi taḍillekhābhir ātarjasi
ārūḍhaḥ padam ādareṇa jalada tvāṃ yācate cātakaḥ |
yady asmai vimukho bhavān api payodhārāḥ karītuṃ tataḥ
śayyākṣālanavāri vāri sarasaḥ klībasya nindyaṃ satām |
nadyas tāḥ śataśo’nyayoṣita iti tyaktopabhogo yuvā
eka eva khago mānī vane vasati cātakaḥ |
pipāsito vā mriyate yācate vā puraṃdaram
tṛṣārtāṃ śocantīṃ na gaṇayati dīnāṃ gṛhavatīṃ
na dīnaḥ pakṣābhyāṃ sthagayati śiśūn ālapati vā |
kulasya svasyāyaṃ pathi na padam alpaṃ ślathayati
yad asmād asmābhiś ciravihitasevair api ghanād
dviṣanto veśantaṃ bhṛśam apalapantaḥ patim apām
apārthīkurvantaḥ saritam anuyāmas tad api tam
gataṃ tad gāmbhīryaṃ taṭam upagataṃ jālikaśataiḥ
sakhe haṃsottiṣṭha tvaritam amuto gaccha sarasaḥ |
haṃsās te’pi sakhe taḍāga bhavataḥ krīḍāsahasrāviṇo
haṃsena sāśru parivṛtya gataṃ nu līnam
kakubhi kakubhi dhvāntakṣubdhaṃ vitatya vidhāya ca
śrutipuṭabhido garjāḥ śreyaḥ kṛtaṃ param ambudaiḥ |
taṭam upagataṃ padme padme niveśitam ānanaṃ
ko’py asti nāma yadi nānyagatir bakoṭaḥ |
na sthātum arhati bhavān iha rājahaṃsa
sānandī bhava rājahaṃsa bhavataḥ syān nāma pakṣonnatiḥ |
mañjīreṇa tathāpi ca dhvanir ayaṃ nirgīyate līlayā
dhik kubjāmbujavetravetasavanāny etāni yat te pika
vyāhāraiḥ paṇayād amīṣu madhurair ebhiḥ kim unmudritaiḥ |
yeṣām asthitbhir apy upāttamukulair āviṣkriyante mudaḥ
bhūmau nopaviśanti ye khalu rajaḥ saṃparkatarkād iva |
teṣām apy atipūjanīyavapuṣāṃ nūnaṃ pikānām iyaṃ
dhik kaṣṭaṃ parapuṣṭateti kim api prācāṃ phalaṃ karmaṇām
mākandān avalokya yaḥ pratidiśaṃ sānandam utkūjitaḥ |
vācālān upalabhya kokilayuvā jātaḥ sa vācaṃyamaḥ
dāty ūhāḥ sarasaṃ rasantu subhagaṃ gāyantu kekābhṛtaḥ
kādambāḥ kalam ālapantu madhuraṃ kūjantu koyaṣṭayaḥ |
patanavidhaye pakṣau syātāṃ na yāvad imau kṣamau |
śuka śokaṃ nanu mā vṛthā kṛthāḥ |
ayi śākunika kṛto’ñjalir itare na katīha jīvanopāyāḥ |
hatvā śukān kim etad vipinam asārasvataṃ kuruṣe
śukasya paritoṣāya na vanaṃ na ca pattanam
bhrātaḥ kīra kim atra nīrasataruskandhe madhusyandibhir
naite dāḍimaśākhinaḥ pariṇatair yeṣāṃ phalair antaraṃ
tad viśrāmyatu naḥ phalaṃ kim api yad vandyena deyaṃ tvayā |
daivād eṣa yadi pradīptagaralas tvāṃ dandaśūko daśed
viśvālokakarī tadā śarad iyaṃ syād eva dṛgvañcitā
ājanmaiva tamaḥ suhṛtkuṭilatā vaktre girāṃ nirgamo
dhig dhātaḥ sasṛje sa eva malinaḥ krūraḥ kathaṃ kauśikaḥ
sṛṣṭo vā kim akalpyatāsya bhavatā kalpāntam āyuḥ sthiram
bhrāmyadbhyo’pi gṛhe gṛhe kaṭutām apy ālapadbhyo giraṃ
gṛdhnubhyo’pi balād amedhyam athavāvajñāṃ vrajadbhyo’pi ca |
śayyotthāyam upāsate vasatim ity etāvatāyaṃ nṬṇāṃ
kākebhyo balir asti kokilabaliḥ kenāpi nākarṇitaḥ
sārāsāravicāriṇī matir iha grāme janānāṃ kutaḥ |
tad yāvad vayam asya sekasalilaṃ voḍhuṃ na mṛṣyāmahe
tāvat satvaram eva pāmarajana grāmād ito gamyatām
dantair upatitaṃ sphuranti valayo niṣkālimānaḥ kacāḥ
śīrṇadeham apetam eva karaṇagrāmeṇa luptā matiḥ |
bhrātar vaidya vidhīyate tava kiyad yāvan mayā bheṣajam
panthāḥ prajvalitaḥ sphuranti purataḥ krūrāḥ kṛśānutviṣaḥ
tadbrahmāṇḍam iha kvacit kvacid api kṣoṇī kvacin nīradās
te dvīpāntaraśālino jaladhayaḥ kvāpi kvacit parvatāḥ |
āścaryaṃ gaganasya ko’pi mahimā sarvair amībhiḥ sthitair
dūre pūraṇam asya śūnyam iti yannāmāpi nācchāditam
na yātāḥ ke pāraṃ sati jaladhibandhe kapibhaṭāḥ |
manujas turaṅgagāvau paśavaḥ pārāvato balākā ca |
padmākaraḥ praśastaḥ sarasī cakraś ca cakravākī ca |
kavidānaṃ guṇigarvo vāṇī kāvyaṃ ca kāvyamātsaryam |
tat sacaṭu daridragṛhī tadgṛhiṇī tadgṛhaṃ jarāvṛddhaḥ |
tāpasabahuviṣayaśamau jñānī bhavitavyatā ca daivaṃ ca |
dhārādhvānamanoharaṃ sakhi payo gāṃ dogdhi dāmodaraḥ
bhogaśroṇir udasyati pratimuhuḥ kūpād apaḥ pāmarī
protthāya drāṅ nirīhaḥ kṣaṇam atha vapur āsyānupūrvaṃ dhunoti
paścād aṅghrī prasārya trikanativitataṃ drāghayitvāṅgam uccair
mandaṃ śabdāyamāno vilikhati śayanād utthitaḥ kṣmāṃ khureṇa
utthāpya vaktram abhihatya muhuś ca vatsāḥ |
utkarṇaḥ kurute kramaṃ karipatau krūrākṛtiḥ keśarī
kutrāpy aklāntigāmī kvacid atipihitaḥ kvāpi tu gāgramātraś
dhanyaṃ kāntam upāntavartinam iyaṃ pārāvatī sevate
kiṃcit kuñcitalocanāṃ sahacarīṃ saṃcumbya cañcvā ciraṃ
pakṣābhyāṃ sahitau prasārya caraṇāv ekaikaśaḥ pārśvayor
gatvā puraḥ katicid eva padāni vegād
harati purattaḥ pārśve paścād valantam anārataṃ
udgrīvastimitekṣanas tata itaḥ paśyan nilīya sthitaṃ
payasi sarasaḥ svacche matsyāñjighṛkṣur itas tato
valitanayanaṃ mandaṃ mandaṃ padaṃ nidadhad bakaḥ |
dalam api calat sapratyāśaṃ muhur muhur īkṣate
kāmaṃ kukkuṭayor dvayaṃ drutapadaṃ krūrakramaṃ yudhyate
nyagbhūtāṃ caṭakaḥ priyām abhisaraty udvepamānaḥ svayam
sevyo’yaṃ malayācalaḥ kim api me cetaḥ karoty utsukam
tvaṅnaddhāmpi latāgṛhāṇi dadhatī kāṃcin mucaṃ yacchati
cetaḥ samprati kampayanti parito gambhīrabhīmā bhuvaḥ
dhanyeyaṃ tamasā nadī harati me dṛṣṭāpi mārgaśramam
saṃtrāsaṃ janayanti vindhyabhidurā vārāṃ pravāhāḥ puraḥ |
svarābhir gopībhir diśi diśi samudghūrṇam aniśam
karau dhatte madhyaṃ kalayati samāśliṣyati kucā
kacān apy ādatte priya iva taḍāgo mṛgadṛśām
asmāc citraśikhaṇḍibhiś ca parame parvaṇy upādīyate
yasminn acchatayā nidhāya nayane martyaiḥ sakautūhalaṃ
tīrāt tīram upaiti rauti karuṇaṃ cintāṃ samālambate
kāntāṃ dhyāyati niścalena manasā yogīva yuktekṣaṇaḥ |
svaccāyām avalokya kūjati punaḥ kānteti hṛṣṭaḥ khago
dhanyās te khalu ye vimuktaviṣayāḥ kaṣṭaṃ paraṃ saṅginām
satrāsaṃ muhur īkṣate ca cakito haṃsaṃ himāṃśubhramān
na svāsthyaṃ bhajate divāpi virahāśaṅkī rathāṅgāhvayaḥ
mitre kvāpi gate saroruhavane baddhānane klāmyati
krandatsu bhramareṣu vīkṣya dayitāśliṣṭān puraḥ sārasān |
vaktre kevalam argaleva nihitā jīvasya nirgacchataḥ
ehy āliṅga tvarayati mano durbalā vāsaraśrīr
nānyāsakto na khalu kupito nānurāgacyuto vā
bhaṅktvā bhīto na bhuṅkte kuṭilavisalatākoṭim indor vitarkāt
tārākārās tṛṣārto na pibati payasāṃ vipruṣaḥ patrasaṃsthāḥ |
kāntāvicchedabhīrur dinam api rajanīṃ manyate cakravākaḥ
pakṣāv utkṣipati kṣitau nipatati kroḍe nakhair ullikhaty
udbāṣpeṇa ca cakṣuṣā sahacaraṃ dhyātvā muhur vīkṣate |
yenālohitamaṇḍalo’pi kṛpayā yāty eṣa nāstaṃ raviḥ
dvau saṃkīrṇau racayati rasau nartakīva pragalbhā
sūrye cāstam upāgate kamalinīpaṇḍe ca nidrālase
pratyutkūjati mūrcchati śvasiti ca vyāghūrṇane tāmyati
bhrāmyaty udvamati kṣamām iva nijaprāṇān muhur nindati
keṣāṃ nāma na locanaśravaṇayor digdakṣiṇā prīṇanam |
adhvanyāḥ ka ivāpare munir ato’gastyo’pi nāvartate
asyāṃ kuḍmalayan karān pariharan nāśās tyajan padminīr
karpūrasya ca yatra ko’pi caturas tāmbūlayogakramaḥ |
deśaḥ kerala eṣa kelisadanaṃ devasya śṛṅgāriṇas
taṃ dṛṣṭvā kuru komalāṅgi saphale drāghīyasī locane
atrāndhrās tava dakṣiṇena ta ime godāvarīsrotasāṃ
yat kṣemaṃ tridivāya vartma nigamasyāṅgaṃ ca yat saptamaṃ
svādiṣṭhaṃ ca yad aikṣavād api rasāc cakṣuś ca yad vāṅmayam |
tad yasmin madhuraṃ prasādi rasavat kāntaṃ ca kāvyāmṛtaṃ
yāte kārmukavidyayā paribhavaṃ sārdhaṃ gaṇānāṃ gaṇaiḥ
ṣaḍvaktre samayaṃ vilaṅghya jayinīm uddiśya śaktiṃ sthite |
viśve paśyata kautukaṃ bhṛgupates tasyaiva rāmo’ṅkuśaḥ
utkṣiptacchatracihnaṃ pratiphalitam api svaṃ vapur vīkṣya kiṃcit
sāsūyaṃ yena dṛṣṭāḥ kṣititalavilasan maulayo bhūmipālāḥ
sādhu mlecchanarendra sādhu bhavato mātaiva vīraprasūr
śastraṃ śāstram iti sphuranti rasanāpatrāntarāle giraḥ
ā ca prācetasābdher bhavatu mama puraḥ ko’pi yady asti vīraḥ
rāme rudraśarāsanaṃ tulayati smitvā sthitaṃ pārthivaiḥ
śiñjāsañjanatatpare ca hasitaṃ dattvā mithas tālikāḥ |
rundhann aṣṭavidheḥ śrutīr mukharayann aṣṭau krīḍayan
mūrtīr aṣṭa maheśvarasya dalayann aṣṭau kulakṣmābhṛtaḥ |
tāny akṣṇā vadhirāṇi pannagakulāny aṣṭau ca sampādayann
utkṣiptaṃ saha kauśikasya pulakaiḥ sākaṃ mukhairnāmitaṃ
vaidehīmanasā samaṃ ca sahasā kṛṣṭaṃ tato bhārgava
prauḍhāhaṃkṛtikandalena ca samaṃ bhagnaṃ tadaiśaṃ dhanuḥ
asādhyaṃ syād etad yadi ca tad amīṣām akṛpaṇāḥ
āśvāsyāśrumukhān muhuḥ priyasakhān preṣyān samādiśya ca |
tāny etāni daśānanāni daśabhir digbhir yadājñā kṛtā |
yasyādyāpi sa eva vīryamahimā tasmin naras tāpasaḥ
śocyaḥ so’pi ripuḥ sa caiva kupitas tasyāpi dūtaḥ kapiḥ
ekā sā nikaṣā paraṃ tanayasūryasyāḥ suto rāvaṇaḥ |
kā ślāghā ghuṇajarjareṇa dhanuṣā kṛṣṭena bhagnena vā
bhagnaṃ bhagnam umāpater ajagavaṃ bālī kṣataś ca kṣatas
tālāḥ sapta hatā hatāś ca jaladhir baddhaś ca baddhaś ca saḥ |
nyakkāro hy ayam eva me yad arayas tatrāpy asau tāpasaḥ
so’py atraiva nihanti rākṣasabhaṭān jīvaty aho rāvaṇaḥ |
dhik dhik śakrajitaṃ prabodhitavatā kiṃ kumbhakarṇena vā
svasattvasyodrekād api daśa śirāṃsi svayam ayaṃ
svāhākāram udāharan na sa daśagrīvo girāṃ gocaraḥ
chindhi tvaṃ juhudhi tvam ity upadiśann ekaḥ paraṃ rāvaṇaḥ
lūne pañca tataś catuṣṭayam iti sraksaṃniveśaiḥ śiraḥ
śambhor uddhatasāhasaikarasikaḥ kair na stuto rāvaṇaḥ
kiṃtu svānunayāya mūrdhanidhanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na yatrāriṇā |
tvatto mūrdhabahutvataḥ phalam idaṃ samyaṅ mayā labhyate
chinnaṃ chinnam avekṣya rākṣasapate svaṃ durnayaṃ jñāsyasi
krīḍan svacchandamadbhiḥ smarasi yad akarod arjunaḥ kārtavīryaḥ |
taddoṣṇāṃ yac ca rāmo raṇabhuvi vidadhe vegavalgatkuṭhāraḥ
prāyaḥ paulastya sā te śravaṇaparigatā kiṃ na vārteti vidmaḥ
kule paulastyānāṃ na nijam amalaṃ janma kalitaṃ
bahoḥ kālān nālocitam atulam uccaiḥ svam ayaśaḥ |
prasūnaṃ puṣpeṣoḥ śaram asahatā kiṃ ca bhavatā
sa patrī saumitrer aśanisahadharmā na gaṇitaḥ
śirobhir mā devīḥ śiva iva na te dāsyati punar
hitaṃ tad brūmas tvāṃ mama janakadordaṇḍavijaya
dyām ālokayatāṃ kalāḥ kalayatāṃ chāyāḥ samācinvatāṃ
kleśaḥ kevalam aṅgulīr dalayatāṃ mauhūrtikānām ayam |
dhanyā sā rajanī tad eva sudinaṃ dhanyaḥ sa eva kṣaṇo
teṣāṃ tvaṃ nidhir āgasām asahanā mānonnatā sāpy ato
gantavyaṃ bhavatā na tadgṛham iti tvaṃ vāryase yāsi cet |
kṣiptaḥ pādatale tadekaśaraṇo manye ciraṃ sthāsyasi
jāne sāsahanā tathāham asakṛn mayy aṅgaṇasthe punas
tasyāḥ saṃbhavitā sa sādhvasarasaḥ ko’pi prakopāpahaḥ |
kutrātmā kva ca mekhaleti galitaḥ prāyaḥ sa mānagrahaḥ
anyā sādhigatā tvayā kva yuvatī yasyāḥ sa mānagraho
asmābhiḥ kalitaṃ purā na bhavatī bhuktā nṛbhiḥ kair api
prauḍhā mānavaśālinīti calitaṃ cetaḥ sakāmaṃ tvayi |
trailokyam udare viṣṇos tādṛg eva vyavasthitam |
tādṛg anyādṛg apy asti hṛdaye tu mahākaveḥ
yan netrais tribhir īkṣate na giriśo nāṣṭābhir apy abjabhūḥ
sakndo dvādaśabhis tathā na maghavā cakṣuḥsahasreṇa yat |
